story:
Update:

As my campaign is winding down I want to sincerely thank all of my amazing supporters and contributors.

I also wanted to include an excerpt from one of my stories to give readers a feel for what my style and content would be. 

"My brother, David is a schizo-effective - which means he's schizophrenic AND bipolar for added fun. He's had a rough go at things. It's hard to know if he would have been semi-normal in a more stable environment, or if fate or what have you, just doomed him from the start. He was diagnosed when he was 13 after some pretty severe trauma, after which they put him in what is called a chemical straightjacket, which means he's so drugged up that he can't really move, think, or feel anything. 

He has always tried very hard to fit in with little success. Eventually he started embracing being an outcast. He loved the movie the Crow with Bruce Lee in it. He identified with the character so much so that he could call himself the Crow and paint his face for Halloween and write the symbol in his own yearbook. He wanted attention more than anything. In high school he went around asking his fellow students for a quarter so he could call in a bomb threat. He then did in fact call in a bomb threat. Of course, none of his classmates felt the need to protect him, and they immediately told on him. Fortunately this was before bomb threats were a huge deal. He was expelled from school and my stepfather home schooled him instead.

He used to go around town and ask people for drugs. He thought he could fit in that way. Most people would give him pieces of paper and tell him it was acid and watch him pretend to trip for fun. One time, when he was around 17, someone gave him real acid and he had convulsions on the street and had to be hospitalized. I remember people hearing the story and being angry that someone had given him real drugs.

He is mentally impaired now from all the severe anti psychotic medications he's been on for the past twenty years. He doesn’t do well when he is expected to be responsible for himself. He’ll do things to jeopardize his freedom. He to this day goes in and out of mental hospitals. He was told several years ago that he had used up his lifetime allowance of hospitalizations. The only way he could get into a hospital going forward is if he's a danger to himself or others. He is so institutionalized at this point that he needs the structure that hospitals and jails provide.

Because of his mental impairment he is easy prey for assholes. In jail it became a game to see what they could get him to do. One time a fellow inmate promised his girlfriend would post David’s bail if he set off a fire alarm. Another time he was promised freedom if he rubbed his feces all over his cell. He spent several months in solitary confinement for these “pranks.” One time his inmates convinced him that he would get released if he injured himself. In response he jumped off a two-story ledge and fractured his leg and ankle in several places. He still tries really hard to fit in. He’s tried to be a Mormon but he couldn’t quit smoking long enough. He’s toyed with the idea of Satanism but I always tell him that it is a horrible idea. He wants to be a Juggalo really badly (which is an extreme fan of the band Insane Clown Posse, or ICP). He tried for years to become a Catholic but kept breaking rules, but alas he made it. He is Catholic now, but still wants to be a Pagan from time to time.

It’s really hard to not feel sorry for him but he doesn’t feel sorry for himself. He doesn’t know any other reality than the one he has.  He just got assigned a guardian by the state. This person has a say in everything he does. It can be bad if there is a support network that disagrees but he doesn’t have that and needs someone to look out for him in all of his decisions. He will hopefully get placed in a healthy environment soon."

Short Summary

I'm from West Virginia. Consider stereotypes of West Virginia: poor, backwards, bad teeth, mental illness to name a few...  Sometimes there are some truths behind stereotypes (not say that all inhabitants fit into this category).  I was raised in an improverished family and was in foster care for a stint. I would like to write a memoir to tell my story. 

Not to say that a book I'd write would be all doom and gloom. I have a sense of humor, but I would like to take a crack at explaining some difficult situations. I studied Philosophy and Sociology in undergrad and feel like I can uniquely view my upbringing.

I want to "shed some light" on hard topics, so my incentive prizes are based around candles that I will make. 

What I Need & What You Get

I've done some research on book writing and the costs build up quickly. 

I would like to take some creative writing classes to help get the tools to write a compelling story so would be around $2,000 - based on taking multiple classes from this renowned organization: http://www.sfgrotto.org/classes/past-classes

I would like to get an agent, if possible and go through a publisher, but if not, then I would self publish. 

Using this site I've estimate the rough cost to be around $7,000 to self publish: http://www.pbs.org/mediashift/2013/05/the-real-costs-of-self-publishing-book 

The candles that I intend to make will be very high quality. Soy based wax that is eco-friendly and long burning. There will be fragrance and non-fragrance options. You will get your choice of candle, scent, and color if you'd like. They will be in repurposed containers, thrift shop cups, glass jars, etc. For high level donations, I will handcraft unique ceramic dishes. 

The Impact

There are many problems that face underpriviledged groups in our society and many members of these populations don't have a voice. I'd like to lead by example and share my story in the hopes that it will inspire change and empower others.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Post a link on Facebook or Twitter, or send an email to your community. Please help me spread the word.

There are great  Indiegogo share tools!

Click on our comments tab to give me feedback.

Thanks for reading this far!

story:
JOIN US! IN THIS WAVE OF CHANGE...

JOIN US! In gettin out the Book that people are talking about: "21st Century Superhuman, Quantum Lifestyle;" and none too soon, for we have entered the long awaited "Shift of the Ages!"

Cary Ellis and Teddi Mulder have been dialoging and teaching transformational wellness for 30-40 years. Just in the last 2 years, Quantum physics, and modern translations of the Ancient Aramaic have come together to reveal the Truth about how to achieve what we dream.

Science is documenting Cosmic changes, that are now accelerating our movement into the greatest evolutionary leap in human history. (Perhaps even more important than the leap that brought us language). What we do in this "now" is up to us!  

Are we ready to step up to our potential? This is a rare and special GUIDEBOOK, offering a trail of "breadcrumbs" on the path, to essential tools, inspiration and understanding, how to transform our lives. There is nothing like it out there!

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

We will be publishing with Balboa Press, subsidary of Hay House, (Louise Hay's publishing company) for a very professional print on demand publishing job. We expect to submit complete manuscript soon during July; which once in print, will be sale on Amazon and Bookstores with Paperback, Audio, Kindle and Nook editions by September. 

Additional tasks and expenses for completion:

  1. Completion of Book; Cover Design; Editing and Layout
  2. Website development at http://www.21stcenturysuperhuman.com
  3. Video Creation - Member Content for Inner Circle 21st Century Superhumans, to Deepen Wisdom and Create Community
  4. Audio Book - Professional Recording
  5. Marketing through Radio Shows (phone calls, packets and admin tasks)
  6. Attending Festivals and Conferences around the country to present book and offer pre and post-publication purchase
  7. We are already being invited to travel to do workshops and speaking

YOU GET TO BE PART OF Spreading Seeds of Awakening throughout the Earth. We will "water" and help them Grow. Our "NOW" is very exciting! All that seems "wrong", can shift globally in an instant, with right knowledge adopted by many on how to return to our "True Design."

LEVELS OF CONTRIBUTION offer "21st Century Superhuman" Bumper Stickers, Ebooks, Books, T-Shirts, Membership and Private Consultations. Begin wearing and sharing our beautiful Mother Gaia 21st Century Superhuman cover image and logo, and have early access to the book.

THE IMPACT 

Failing economies and societal systems breaking down, put us on the brink of our own demise. The world is ripe for restructuring. It is up to us to return to healthy living, and to restore our way of thinking and being to our True Design, built around Love, to shift into the kind of future we would like to live in.

Albert Einstein said, "Problems cannot be solved at the same level at which they were created."

This is a Step-by-Step Guide, we like to call a "primer," that takes a deep look at how to change the structure of our thought, followed up by tools to implemnt, on a personal level; cleansing, detox, nutrition, and Quantum reality.

BACKGROUND

Though this book was conceived years ago, we were unwilling to offer it until we discovered the depths of "right knowledge" about what makes us well, healthy, abundant and happy.  We are proud to finally bring this work forward!

With over 80 years of combined practical experience in the field of human well-being and transformation; Cary and Teddi know that this deep alchemical understanding of their material is paramount to their success. 

Cary's book "Super Immunity Secrets" has been for sale on amazon.com for several years, along with several other ebooks.

Many Ways to Assist

Any amount helps, and there are many ways to be of great assistance:

A HUGE way to help is to get the word out, pass this link on to everyone you know, and let others know about our campaign. Email links to your friends or share on Facebook.

Indiegogo also has "share" tools, to make it easy for you to get it out there!

ALSO: If you have web or office skills or other resources you'd like to assist with, let us know. There are many details yet to be done, which include web development, phone calls for presentations, travel vehicles, etc. We trust the flow of Spirit to fulfill these needs. 

Love & Blessings -

Cary Ellis & Teddi Mulder

story:
TAKE A MOMENT...

...imagine something wonderful with me.  Something that will entertain your kids with excitement, fun, and imagination. Something that is sure to bring them joy as they get lost in a story.  Mix together these components: fantasy and fiction, magic, supernatural, and of course superheroes.  Now, tell me what you get?  I’ll tell you what I got; I got an epic story called “TALES OF THE KRYVESIC ORB”.  

Hi Im King Author, the creator and writer of this captivating story that is designed to introduce something different.  I have been a writer since my early teenaged years and have always dreamed of publishing. Now that I have the opportunity to do so, I want to bring to life a story written for young adult but definitely able to be enjoyed by kids of all ages.


Summary


To Read The Full Summary For Book 1 CLICK HERE!


Why I Chose Crowd-Funding???

I only recently became familiar with crowd-funding and very glad I did.  With this campaign I will be able to produce the first of a maturing series of books meant to bring wonder into your home through the imaginations of you and your children.  With the help of contributors like yourself, I will raise the funding need to properly introduce this book series to the world.  Proper marketing, proper advertising, proper promoting, and of course proper publishing.  I believe in this book series, and not just because I wrote it.  I believe in it because it is what every young adult need to develop a safe, positive, and fair future through diverse literature that does not handicap their self-esteem.  I believe in it because I know that every adult has a part of them that is still fascinated with make believe.

Another reason is now I can show and prove what all of my friends hear me constantly talking about on a daily basis.  I have the opportunity to back-up all the enthusiasm and hype I put on about the story, the characters, the events and situations.

Lastly, and most importantly, I decided to go the crowd-funding route because this is a very advantageous outlet to spotlight my book series and have early interactions with my supporters.  I am able to use my campaign to raise money yes, but I am also able to use it to get out an early buzz.


***Many Ways To Support***

Campaign Goal

Crowdfunding in term means to obtain funding from a crowd/group of people.  The amount of money I aim to raise is $10,000. This funding will help with the expenses to produce the first and second books in the first series.  Donations can start with a minimal contribution of $1.  The money generated will go toward many of the necessary elements to increase success: inclusive self-publishing packages, marketing and advertising, promotional materials, editor, website design, artist, PR rep, and of course a book launch event once the product is produced.  Any pledge is an appreciated pledge.

Promotional Support

Although your donations are a much appreciated and needed to support FUTURE-n-FANTASY, I have to ask an additional favor.  This favor is to MAKE SOME NOISE - pass the word along to others you know.  This campaign page has a SHARE feature that allows you to post it to your social network sites.  This will further the buzz and that also is a HUGE help.


Transparency Is The Best Policy

"So Now It's Time For The Breakdown..."

Publishing – Although it is the dream of many to be noticed by a traditional publishing house, I have been researching for years the differences, pros, and cons of traditional publishing vs. self-publishing.  I have found that with traditional publishers you risk having them change many aspects of your work. (not being able to complete)  Strongly considering my primary mission to of DIVERSITY against specific character roles normally applied to certain literature and film, I decided to go with self-publishing to ensure I will deliver the positive and overdue message I hope to deliver.  Additionally I have an outline of 3 separate series that I  intended to write for the complete collection.  Many traditional publishing houses do not allow for you to be competition for their other authors in the same genre or competition for yourself.  This limits the amount of books you are allowed to release at a time. This wouldn't work for me as I plan to keep my readers happy.   Self-publishing packages vary in price but to get the best circulation and benefits for a writing project you have to expect to go with a package in the range of $2500 - this I will apply to the first 2 books in the first series.

Marketing, Advertising, & Promotional materials – A key factor to success is exposure.  To build a brand and a fan base you have to market yourself and your product.  Advertising and promoting my brand is consequential to it reaching the level of expectation I hope for.  These three components, within themselves, are a MOST VITAL part.  Good marketing, advertising, and promoting beneficially done will be in the range of $2000.

Editor – Book editing is imperative to producing a professional piece of work. and to produce a thoroughly edited fiction project you want to hire 2 different types of editor (or one who can do both jobs)  One type of editor is a basic COPY EDITOR - who review your works for punctuation errors, tense writing, spelling - $500. The second type of editor is the DEVELOPMENTAL EDITOR - who strategically check the development of the story and make sure it is properly executed for the readers enjoyment - $800.   Because I am creating a book series, of which I have finished 2 and working on the 3rd, I will need to hire an editor to edit these books and the others upon completion.  Book editors have a different asking price and agreements between the writer and editor varies.  I was able to work with 

Website Design – A great website will boost the credibility of not just the product but also the person creating this product.  I know that going to the internet and reviewing information on something that has your attention will give you much reassurance.  Hiring a graphic/web designer will be in the price range of up to $1500 but totally worth it.  I have planned to create a website that will be INTERACTIVE for everyone who reads my books.  It will feature extra stories on the characters allowing you to become more familiar with them.  It will also show you the location of where the novels take place.  Additional illustrations on our heros and villains for visual pleasures, for sale materials, links to the artist I work with, etc.

Artist – As a fantasy-fiction writer I know all too well how having visual references is EXTREMELY IMPORTANT.  An artist of great talent is most certainly needed to do cover work and also promo work.  This will build a sight stimulate and expectation of the series.  I however am just a writer and I will have to commission "starving" artist to work with to come up with designs for marketing and advertising.  During this process I would like to work with indie artist in hopes of getting them the exposure they need to further their careers also. 

PR Rep – I learned the hard way that most people fail to reach success because they try to do everything on their own.  I will do as much as I can but if I am able to contract a person in the profession of working hard to spread a brand that would be a great opportunity to take advantage of.  Obtaining enough funding to invest in a Boutique PR firm to promote my project, and get some supplemental exposure would INCREASE THE SUCCESS BY 50%. The rep will also manage many other aspects such as, social medial; which in today’s time highly recommended and necessary to reach people.  The rep will work on promoting to sources such as TV and radio, news outlets, etc.  My research has turned up that for $1500 a Boutique PR firm could be contracted for a project.

Book Launch Event – At the end of it all a book launch event is another way to further promote the book series, myself, and to engage a new and your already obtain audience.  I have chosen to do a launch party that is geared towards the audience the books are currently written for. Any event varies in price because there are certain variables to consider; i.e. venue, refreshments, staff, caterer, etc.  These variables cannot be predetermined as to how much it will cost until that time arrives.


How About We Discuss Some PERKS

No one expects to get something without giving something back and because of this I have designed some really AWESOME PERKS to encourage, reward, and just to say THANK YOU to my contributors.  They have been designed to happily accommodate the contributor for their sacrifice towards making my dream come true.  These perks include but not limited to: free signed copies of the book, E-book copies, original collectibles/collectables such as trading cards and bookmarks, invites to my special book launch party, and even a character in the story.  

With a specific perk option you can even collaborate with me, the author, and design a hero or villain character after yourself or a child of your choice for a future book in the series.

DISCLAIMER:

  1. Submissions for name of parties under 18 requires written consent from parent including proof of guardianship.
  2. PERK selector will be held reliable for the submission of name and details if submission holds resemblance (directly or indirectly) to any actual person not in agreement to submission.
  3. PERK selector receives designer credit but author maintain complete ownership of any & all character(s)
  4. Restitution offered at authors' discretion.
  5. Character/Name will appear in future book of current series.
  6. May not be produced before end of 2014.


Missing The Mark

If for any reason my campaign does not reach the funding goal it doesn't mean I will stop.  Any and all funding acquired will go towards publishing.  This way I can still produce a product for all the people who have made their donation to seeing a product produced.  However, I have some ideas for some stretch goals so let's try and hit that mark.


This Is Good For Us All

I have always been a fan of fantasy, fiction, supernatural, magic, and of course Superhero’s.  But the obvious problem is the producers of these genres are mostly interested in money and not the indirect psychosomatic effects limiting ones relation to them can cause.  I would like to use my writing to eliminate this problem continuing because the effect on the younger audience is even worse.  It conditions them to develop mentally around it.  It weights heavily on their SELF-ESTEEM and the development of their delicate imaginations.  The smallest positive modification in the mind can result in a much needed change in behavior and habits of their future selves.  It can change the way they interact with peers of how they view others cultures.

With "Tales Of The Kryvesic Orb" I attempts to make a stance against character roles and bring a sledge hammer to the continued construction of the wall that is built around ALL audiences.  A wall that blocks the possibility of venturing into or being considered for other genres and ultimately the character role they will play in life.  I want every person who reads my novels to know that they can fit in anywhere.  They can relate to any role (in life) they want.  They don't have to only relate to what they are expected to appeal to.

I grew up in a very urban community.  However, I was always interested in leaning the differences in other communities.  Upon exploring I was introduced to SO MANY different possibilities; some I didn't think were for me but I knew I wanted to feel connected.  I wanted to understand.  I did that for myself and now I want to do it for the future.  The stories I read and movies I watched DID NOT offer the same situations to each type of person.  They had a vision and went with it but I had a vision of letting a person's imagination speak for itself.  As a young adult I want to like the differences in all communities but  I didn't want to feel it didn't apply to me.  So I write stories that take all people and all roles and let them happen as they may.

My books are positive influences and positive encouragements to show that you can fit into any character role as you read them and by feeling like this you can assert that in your everyday living.  If you wanted to be a world famous adventurer you could be that no matter who you are or where you come from.  If you want to be a hero and not just a victim of circumstance it CAN apply to you.  I can go on and on but the bottom line is DIVERSITY in imagination is HIGHLY IMPORTANT.  You don't have to fit into the role expected of you.

story:
I work in a public elementary school that is comprised of about half Amish students.  Last year when I was working with a second grade Amish student helping her pick out a book in the library, she said, 'Mrs. Anderson, why aren't there any books with Amish kids in them?"

  So I wrote a book for Sharon with the help of a local couple who helped me translate the book into Dutch, the Amish language.  It was not easy, because Dutch is not a written language, so the Dutch passages are phonetically spelled.  The book is written in English, and every other paragraph is the Dutch translation of the story. 

  The book is written for elementary age children and is the first in a series called The Adventures of Katie and Ben: At the Creek.  I envision this series portraying Katie and Ben's adventures on the family farm and community.

  I believe this book is a winning idea on two different levels:

1. The Amish market. Hundreds of Amish kindergarten students enter public school in our area and around the country with only a minimal amount of experience speaking English.  My book, which I believe is the first of its kind, would help bridge the gap from home to school in an entertaining way. 

2.  The tourist market.  Our area (and other areas of the country like Pennsylvania and Ohio) attracts tens of thousands of tourists every summer who come to enjoy the quiet communities, the Amish lifestyle, and one of the largest flea markets in the country bringing over a half million tourists per year to town.  I think this book would sell very well to tourists who would enjoy trying to speak Dutch as a remembrance of their experience here.  

  I would like $2000 for an initial self-publishing book run of several hundred copies and advertising.  After that, the selling of additional books would pay for more copies to become self-sustaining.

I would like $2000 for an initial self-publishing book run of several
hundred copies and advertising.  After that, the selling of
additional books would pay for more copies to become self-sustaining.

What is the Land of Hope?

Was ist das Land der Hoffnung?

希望の国とは？


Some years ago, I performed as a soloist with the San Francisco Ballet, and during my time backstage I took on a huge creative project that lasted nine years - to turn a blank square meter piece of fabric into a beautiful landscape using the art of needlepainting, or embroidery. The finished piece, pictured below, shows a spectacular world where humans and nature lived in perfect harmony with one another. I called it Land of Hope, as it depicts what I believe the world could be like if we empower ourselves and our children to do good.

Während der Zeit, die ich als Solist des San Francisco Ballet hinter der Bühne bei Proben und Warten verbrachte, begann  ich ein Projekt, das letztlich neun Jahre dauerte: ich begann ein Einquadratmeter großes Stück Stoff lückenlos und mit Reliefs mit sehr dünnen Fäden zu besticken. Langsam entstand eine Märchenlandschaft, in der Menschen, Tiere und Fabelwesen in Harmonie miteinander und mit der Natur leben. So entstand das "Land der Hoffnung", von dem ich glaube, das es möglich ist, wenn wir und unsere Kindern sich dafür entscheiden.

何年も前の事ですが、サンフランシスコバレエ団でソリストとして踊っていた頃、私は舞台裏で待っている間９年の歳月をかけ、大掛かりなプロ ジェクトを手掛けました。それは、一枚の無地の生地に「ニードルペインティング」（刺繍）で、美しい風景を描くものでした。出来上がった作品は、下の写真 でご覧いただける通り、自然と人間が完全に調和して暮らす素晴らしい世界を描いています。それは、大人も子どもも皆が良い行いをしたら世界はきっとこんな 風になるだろうと私が信じる「希望の国」を表現しています。

After leaving the ballet, my wife and I opened our own dance studio in Berlin. Over the years, we have watched many of our students grow from small children into beautiful, flourishing women and men with strong values of friendship, courage, and helpfulness. Inspired by their positive influences in the world, we wish to create a multilingual children's story book intended to empower even more children to grow as our students did and make the world a better place. Our book, based on the Land of Hope tapestry, would use close-up images taken from the needlepainting artwork to tell a story of how to grow up to be a strong person by encouraging children to respect others, have courage, and be helpful, along with many other important lessons.

Nachdem ich das Ballett verliess, zog ich nach Berlin und schloss mich meiner Frau an, die dort ein Tanzstudio betrieb. Im Laufe der Jahre wurden wir Zeugen, wie aus kleinen Ballettschülern Erwachsene wurden, die als junge Männer und Frauen mit Werten wie Freundschaft, Mut und Hilfsbereitschaft lebten. Dies inspirierte mich zu der Idee eines Kinderbuches, das eine mehrsprachiges Geschichte erzählt. Und vielleicht andere Kinder beeinflusst ebenfalls andere zu respektieren, mutig und liebevoll zu sein, und die welt zu einem besseren Platz zu machen. Als Hintergrund benutze ich Nahaufnahmen des Needlepainting Werkes Land of Hope.

バレエの世界を離れた後、私は妻と共にベルリンにスタジオを開きました。そこで私達は、子どもだった生徒達が友情、勇敢、誠実さを大切にする、輝きにあふ れた大人へと成長し羽ばたいて行く姿を目の当たりにしました。社会で活躍する彼等の姿に私は強く心を動かされ、更に多くの子ども達に、私の生徒達の様に成 長して、より良い世界を作ってほしいと願うようになり、多言語の絵本を作ろうと決心しました。この絵本は、「希望の国」の刺繍のイメージを用いて、人を敬 う事、勇気を持つ事、人に親切に接する事といった大切な人生のレッスンが、子ども達の素晴らしい成長に結びついていくということを物語っています。

Land der Hoffnung, Landschaftsbild mit filigranen Details

The completed Land of Hope, a full landscape in astonishing detail.

「希望の国」の全貌

The Story

Die Geschichte

あらすじ


The story focuses on Pepito, a man smaller than a blade of grass. He is envious of those around him who are big and strong, and his greatest wish is to be like them. He falls asleep one day and wakes up in the Land of Hope, where he meets many fascinating creatures. He asks each of them how he can become big and strong like them. 

One after another, each character gives suggestions to help him become a better person, such as having respect for others, giving a helping hand where needed, having courage in tough situations, and so on. In the end, Pepito realizes that having a big heart is more important than having a big body, and that even if he is small he can still make great changes in the world.

Die Geschichte erzählt von Pepito, einem Männlein klein wie ein Grashalm . Er ist neidisch auf alle um ihn herum, die groß und kräftig sind, er wünscht sich ebenso zu sein. Eines tages erwachte er im Land der Hoffnung und trifft dort viele faszinierende Wesen. Er fragt jeden, wie er denn groß und stark werden könne. Einer nach dem anderen gibt einen Rat und macht Vorschläge, um ihm zu helfen. Z.B. Respekt für andere zu haben, anderen in der Not zu helfen oder Mut in schwierigen Situationen zu beweisen und so weiter. Am Ende versteht Pepito, dass es wichtiger ist ein großes Herz als einen großen Körper zu haben, und dass auch ein kleines Männlein große Dinge in der Welt bewirken kann!

主人公は、芝生の草よりも背の低いペピートです。彼は、周りにいる大きくて強い男の人たちに憧れています。ペピートの一番の願いは彼等のよ うに強くてたくましくなる事です。ある日、ペピートが目覚めると、彼は希望の国にいました。そこで彼は、風変わりで素敵な住人たちに出会う度に、どうした ら強く、大きくなれるか尋ねました。

希望の国の住人達は、ペピートの問いかけに、他者に敬意を持って接する事、困った人を助ける事、困難な状況でも勇気を持って立ち向かう事など様々な 助言をくれました。最後にペピートは、身体が大きいことより、大きな心を持つ方が大事だということ、自分がどんなに小柄でも世の中を大きく変えられるんだ という事に気がつきました。

One of Horacio's sketches of Pepito. Various images like this one will be scattered throughout the pages for children to find - more information on the imagined layout can be found further down on this page.

Dies ist eine von Horacio´s Zeichnungen. Dies ist Pepito, der auf vielen Seiten auftaucht, wo ihn die Kinder suchen müssen. Mehr Information zum Lay-Out  weiter  unten auf deiser seite.

オーラシオが描いたペピートのスケッチ。このようなイメージを絵本の所々に描いて、子ども達に楽しんでもらおうと思っています。絵本のレイアウトに関しては、下記をご覧下さい。


Why is this so important? 

Warum ist dieses Buch wichtig?

このプロジェクトの重要性


It is our belief that children cannot get enough positive influences in their growing years, so that they can become adults with good values to live by. When we raise a child to be good and compassionate, we bring more positive energy into the world. It's no secret that there are issues that exist around the globe that keep some people from living the best life they could have, and by teaching our next generations to be compassionate and helpful, we create a force for good that could, with time, bring peace to this world. The more we encourage children to have strong positive values, the closer we come to bringing the Land of Hope off the canvas and into reality.

Wir glauben fest daran, dass Kinder garnicht genug positive Einflüsse bei ihrer Erziehung erfahren können, um später als Erwachsene ein festes Fundament an positiven Glaubenssätzen zu haben. Jedes Kind, das zu Mitgefühl erzogen wird, wird selber immer einen positiven Beitrag in seinem Leben leisten. Die Welt ist vielerorts in Aufruhr, es gibt weltweit ernste Probleme. Da ist es wichtig, den Kindern liebevolle Energie und Erziehung zu geben, damit die Welt zu mehr Frieden und liebevollem Miteinander findet. Umso mehr Kinder starke positive Wertvorstellungen haben, umso eher kann aus dem Land of Hope Realität werden!

今 の子ども達は、正しい価値観を持つ大人へと成長する課程において、良い影響を与えられる機会が減っているのではないかと感じています。私たち大人が、思い やりと正しい心をもつ子どもを育てることができれば、世界にもっと有益な変化をもたらし、社会に貢献できると考えています。今、世界ではさまざまな問題が 起きていて、本来なら手にできるはずの幸せな生活を送れない人々がいます。将来をになう子ども達に、人に対する思いやりを育くみ、大切さを教え伝えること ができたら、きっといつか、それが世界の平和につながっていくに違いないと考えます。子ども達に強い正義感や前向きに生きていくすばらしさを伝えることが できたら、この「希望の国」を布の上の刺繍の世界から現実のものに近づけることができるはずです。

We are also aiming to make this book multilingual, for two main reasons: 1) We want Pepito's journey to be accessible to children all over the world, not just in English-speaking countries, and 2) exposing children to foreign languages at an early age helps them gain an interest in other cultures, which helps them develop the ideas of empathy and cooperation.  These go well with the other values presented in this book, and are especially helpful in our modern global world. Our base goal is for English and German, and we are working with a Japanese translator. Perhaps another language could be added if there is enough space and interest. We will keep you up-to-date on any developments.

Unser Ziel ist es, das Buch mehrsprachig heraus zu geben. Das hat mehrere Gründe, zum einem kann so Pepitos Geschichte in vielen Ländern gelesen und verstanden werden, zum anderen lernen Kinder von klein auf, dass es verschiedene Sprachen und Kulturen gibt, deren Unterschiedlichkeit wertfrei und selbstverständlich ist. Das ist in der globalen Welt von heute sicher von Vorteil. Im Moment gibt es die geschichte auf deutsch und englisch, eine japanische Übersetzung ist in Planung, auch andere Sprachen können hinzu gefügt werden, je nach Platz und Interesse. Wir halten Sie über die Entwicklung auf dem Laufenden,

私は、次に挙げます二つの理由でこの絵本を多国語で出版したいと考えています。まず一つ目は、英語圏だけでなく、世界中の子ども達にペピー トの冒険を楽しんでもらいたいと思っています。そして二つ目は、子ども達には早くから外国語に触れる機会を与え、自国とは異なる文化に興味を持ち、他者に 対する共感や、協調性を養う事に役立ててほしいと思うからです。

以上二点は、この絵本から学んでもらいたい他の大切な価値観とともに、子ども達がグローバル化が進む現代社会を生きていくために、非常に役立つものだと考 えます。　先ずは、英語、ドイツ語で出版する事が目標ですが、現在、日本語への翻訳も検討中です。賛同・支援して下さる方がいれば、その他の言語への翻訳 も検討したいと思っております。当プロジェクトの進展については、随時ご報告申し上げます。


What We Need

Was wir brauchen

皆様のご支援のお願い


Land of Hope has already been fully written, and we are already working with a German publishing company, S. Fischer Verlage, to get it out into the world. They have given us a price estimate of 7,000 Euro as an absolute minimum for production. It's a greater amount than we can afford to pay out-of-pocket, which is why we are turning to you for help! Every dollar or euro counts.

Das Land der Hoffnung ist bereits fertig geschrieben, und wir sind in Kontakt mit einem deutschen Verlagshaus (S. Fischer Verlage). Dort hat man uns einen Mindestpreis von 7 500 € für Druck und Vertrieb genannt. Leider fehlt uns das nötige geld, so wenden wir uns an Sie - jeder noch so kleine Betrag hilft.

「希望の国」の原稿は、既に出来上がっており、ドイツの出版社、S. Fischer Verlageから、絵本を世に送りだす準備を進めています。しかし、出版には、最低でも7,000ユーロの出資を要します。これは、私が個人的に用意で きる金額を上回るものです。そのため、ぜひ皆様のご支援を頂ければと、今回お願いしております次第です。ご賛同いただきご支援を賜ることができましたら幸 いです。

However, our ultimate goal is €13,000 - that would cover editing, printing, production, grade-A advertisement, shipping and distribution to bookstores around the country, and would also upgrade the book into a larger, more child-friendly format. We've read the statistics on successful crowdfunding projects and know that a lower number is easier to reach, so we're hoping your generosity will go above and beyond our minimum goal to help us reach €13,000.

Das ultimative Ziel sind 13 000 €, was ausser Druck und allen damit verbundenen Kosten wie Versand und Vertrieb eine Top-Grade-A- Werbeaktion mit einschliesst. Das Buch könnte so auch ein etwas größeres, kinderfreundlicheres Format bekommen. Wir haben uns über erfolgreiche Crowdfunding-Projekte informiert und hoffen sehr, dass wir es schaffen, die optimale Summe zu erzielen. 

上記の金額は、出版に最低限必要な額であり、編集、印刷、製本、広告、発送、国内外への書籍流通・販売、そして、子ども達にとって親しみや すい大きめのサイズ、読みやすいフォーマットにするなど、多少の工夫を加えますと、必要経費は13,000ユーロ程度になると概算しております。目標金額 を低めに設定したほうがプロジェクトの成功率が高いという統計を目にしたこともありますが、わたし達としましても、皆様の温かいご支援をいただき、子ども 達のためにより質の高い絵本を届けることができるよう、努力を惜しまない所存です。

Even if you can't contribute monetarily to Land of Hope, you can still help us out by spreading the word to anyone who may be interested! Sharing, emailing, tweeting, and word-of-mouth are absolutely invaluable to getting this project off the ground.

Wenn Sie im Moment finanziell nicht helfen können, freuen wir uns, wenn Sie helfen, indem Sie andere auf das Projekt aufmerksam machen, die vielleicht helfen können. Soziale Netzwerke, Emails, Kaffeklasch, Mundpropaganda, all dies trägt dazu bei, das Projekt zu verwirklichen. 

「希 望の国」に金銭的なご支援を頂けない場合でも、是非、このプロジェクトの事をお知り合いの方々へ伝えていただけたら幸いです。　情報のシェアリング、E メールやツイッターを介して、又は、直接お話して頂くだけでも、このプロジェクトの実現に向けて非常にありがたい支援となります。

This book is perfect for parents of young children, expecting parents, or even aunts, uncles, grandparents, and other relatives searching for a gift for the young ones in their lives.

Dieses Buch ist ein schönes Geschenk für Eltern kleiner Kinder, also Eltern, Tanten, Onkel, Omas und Opas, Familie und Freunde- hier ist ein Geschenk für Eure  kleinen Lieblinge!

この絵本は、幼いお子様のご両親、もうすぐ生まれてくるお子様を心待ちになさっているご夫婦はもちろん、おじ様おば様、おじい様おばあ様、親戚の方々にとって、身近にいる大切なお子様達への特別なプレゼントににぴったりだと思います。


What You Get by Helping

Was Sie bekommen, wenn Sie mithelfen

ご支援いただいた方々への特典


Of course, you benefit from helping us get published too! We couldn't ask for your money without giving a little something in return. Perks range from digital wallpapers and e-books to a signed hard copy and a personalized sketch from the author/artist. Check the column on the right for more details!

Natürlich sollen Sie für Ihre Hilfe auch etwas bekommen! Als Dankeschön bekommen Sie je nach Höhe der Spende z.B. digitale Wallpaper für Ihren PC, E-Bücher, signierte Exemplare, eine originale Zeichnung des Autors und mehr. Bitte schauen Sie in die Spalte hier rechts für mehr Information.

ご支援いただいた皆様には、コンピュター用の壁紙、電子書籍、サイン入り絵本、著者・挿し絵画家からご支援者様だけのために描きましたスケッチなど様々なお礼ををご用意しております。画面右にある詳細をご確認下さい。

On the left, a Land of Hope folder. Ideally, the finished book will look something like this as well. On the right, Horacio's autobiography, Confessions of a Male Belly Dancer.These and many other perks are available to our supporters!

Links im Bild: Das Land der Hoffnung
Idealerweise wird das Kinderbuch so aussehen. Rechts sehen Sie Horacio´s Autobiographie "Confessions of a Male Belldancer". Dies sind Beispiele für die Perks für Unterstützer.

左：『希望の国』フォルダー。完成した絵本をイメージしています。

右：オーラシオの自伝、『Confessions of a Male Belly Dancer』

(仮訳：『男ベリーダンサーの告白』)　この他、様々な特典をご用意しております。



Predicted Timeline

Zeitplan

想定タイムライン


So, how long is this all going to take? 

So, wann wird was passieren?

このプロジェクトのタイムスケジュールは、どの様なものでしょうか。


In a perfect world, the timeline would look something like this:

Wenn alles klappt, sieht der Plan aus wie folgt:

想定しているタイムスケジュールは、以下の通りです。


October 31st, 2014: Crowdfunding begins!

Mid-December 2014: Crowdfunding ends, all funds calculated, collected, and sent to publishers. Digital perks sent to supporters - just in time for the holidays!

January 2015: Publishing company begins production process for Land of Hope

Summer 2015: Printing is completed, books sent to Horacio and later distributed to bookstores

Summer/Fall 2015: Physical rewards shipped out to supporters, arriving once again just in time for the holidays!

31. Oktober 2014: das Crowdfunding beginnt!
Mitte Dezenber 2014: das Crowdfunding endet, alle Spenden gehen an den Verlag, die digitalen Perks (Belohnungen)  gehen an die Spender, pünktlich zum Weihnachtsfest!
Januar 2015: der Verlag beginnt die Produktion.
Sommer 2015: der Druck ist fertig, die Bücher werden versendet und an Buchläden verschickt.
Sommer/Herbst 2015: alle nicht-digitalen Perks , d.h. alle Geschenke werden verschickt, pünktlich zum nächsten Fest!

2014年10月31日：クラウドファンディング開始！

2014年12月中旬：クラウドファンディング終了。支援額の計算、出版社に送金。支援者への特典中、ネット上送信できるものは、クリスマス前にお届けします！

2015年1月：出版社「希望の国」絵本制作開始

2015年夏期：印刷・製本終了。オーラシオの手元に本が届けられ、いよいよ書店流通へ。

2015年夏・秋期：デジタル以外の特典を支援者様へ郵送。

Realistically, we know lots of things could happen to delay this process. If the crowdfuding isn't as successful as we hope, it may take some extra time to scrape up the last bit of money needed to pay the publishers. Printing may take longer than expected at the publishers, and mailing speeds can sometimes be unpredictable, especially internationally and around holidays. We can't know ahead of time what might happen, but we promise to keep you informed of all updates, good and bad, as soon as we find out about them. 

Es können immer Dinge passieren, die den Ablauf verzögern. Wenn z.B. das Crowdfunding nicht den gewünschten Erfolg hat. kann es noch dauern, bis wir den Rest zusammen gekratzt haben. Der Druck kann läner dauern, Versandzeiten können abweichen (vor allem international). Falls eine Verzögerung eintritt, werden alle benachrichtigt sobald wir davon Kenntnis haben.

以上は、あくまでも想定しているタイムラインであり、現実的には、様々な原因でプロセスに遅れが出る可能性が考えられます。例えば、当キャ ンペーン中に集められた支援金が目標額を下回った場合、残りの必要な額を集めて出版社に送金するのに時間がかかったり、印刷が予想以上に長引いたり、郵 送、特にホリデー・シーズン中の海外郵送に時間がかかる事など考えられます。このの様な状況に変更があり次第、責任を持って皆様に随時ご報告致します。


How it Will Look

Wie wird das Buch aussehen?

完成した絵本


We are envisioning our book to be approximately 22 x 1 x 30 centimeters. Each turn of the page will reveal a beautiful photograph from the Land of Hope tapestry, with a corresponding text (in at least two languages) on the other side that tells Pepito's story. Small sketches of the little man in various poses will appear alongside the text.

Wir planen das Buch in der Größe 22 x 1 x 30 cm. Bei jedem Umblättern sieht man eine neue Seite mit einem Bildausschenitt des Werkes "Land der Hoffnung" zeigen mit den dazu gehörigen Texten in mindestens zwei Sprachen auf der gegenüberliegenden Seite. Kleine Zeichnungen des kleinen Pepito ergänzen das Bild.

完成した絵本は、22cm x 1cm x 30cm 程のサイズを考えています。各ページを開くと、そこには、「希望の国」刺繍のタペストリーの美しい写真が広がり、それにあわせて少なくとも2つ以上の言語 でペピートのお話しを描きます。文章の隣には、かわいらしいペピートが様々なポーズで現れます。

One of our draft pages. So far, this only has the German text, and the height isn't exactly right. As soon as we have an updated version of this, we will let you know! See below for the English and Japanese translations that will be on this page:

Hier ein Beispiel, erstmal nur mit dem deutschen Text und vorläufigem Format. Der englische Text folgt:

絵本の中のあるページのドラフトです。ここでは、皆さまに絵本のイメージをお伝えするために見本としてドイツ語の本文を入れてあります。本のサイズ少々完成版と異なります。校正したものができましたら改めて掲載します。下記に日本語の仮訳を掲載しましたのでご覧ください。



'To his great surprise Pepito met a man who was even smaller then he was.

Pepito said to him: “How can you be happy being so very small?”

And the small man answered: “Because I see that life is full of treasures like this pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.”

“Yes”, said Pepito, “I see. But I want to be big.”

“Good," said the small man, “then you must respect all persons whether they are smaller or bigger than you; then you will be big. Come with me to the pond for a drink.”'

ペピートはびっくりして目を丸くしました。

ここには、僕より小さい住人がいたなんて！

「どうしてそんなに小さくても幸せでいられるの？」ペピートは、尋ねました。

「それは、この虹の果てにある黄金の壷の様な宝ものが、人生には、たくさんあるからだよ。」と応えました。

「へぇ。そうなんだ。」「でもね、ぼくは、大きくなりたいんだ。」

「そうか。」その小さな住人は言いました。「それなら、自分より大きい人でも、小さい人でも、誰に対しても敬意をもって接することだな。そうしたら君は大きくなれるさ。ほら、一緒に池のほうにいって何か飲もうじゃないか。」






Perks

特典



€1 EUR

Blade of Grass

Every euro counts, and this euro will earn you a downloadable desktop wallpaper featuring a creature from the Land of Hope, as well as my undying gratitude for your help.

Grashalm
Jeder Euro zählt! Für eine 1 € Spende bekommen Sie einen Computer-Bildhintergrund zum Downloaden, der eine der Wesen des Land of Hope darstellt sowie meine ewige Dankbarkeit.
Blade of Grass
１ユーロも貴重な支援金です。1ユーロご支援くださった方々には、私から皆様に感謝を込めて「希望の国」に登場するキャラクターのデスクトップ用壁紙を特典としてご用意しております。

SEE PERKS BELOWPERKS GANZ UNTEN特典に関しては、下記をご覧下さいWhat is the Land of Hope?
Was ist das Land der Hoffnung?

希望の国とは？
Some years ago, I performed 
as a soloist with the San Francisco Ballet, and during my time backstage
 I took on a huge creative project that lasted nine years - to turn a 
blank square meter piece of fabric into a beautiful landscape using the 
art of needlepainting, or embroidery. The finished piece, pictured 
below, shows a spectacular world where humans and nature lived in 
perfect harmony with one another. I called it Land of Hope, as it 
depicts what I believe the world could be like if we empower ourselves 
and our children to do good. Während der Zeit, die ich als Solist des San Francisco Ballet hinter der Bühne bei Proben und Warten verbrachte, begann 
 ich ein Projekt, das letztlich neun Jahre dauerte: ich begann ein 
Einquadratmeter großes Stück Stoff lückenlos und mit Reliefs mit sehr 
dünnen Fäden zu besticken. Langsam entstand eine Märchenlandschaft, in 
der Menschen, Tiere und Fabelwesen in Harmonie miteinander und mit der 
Natur leben. So entstand das "Land der Hoffnung", von dem ich glaube, 
das es möglich ist, wenn wir und unsere Kindern sich dafür entscheiden.何年も前の事ですが、サンフランシスコバレエ団でソリストとして踊っていた頃、私は舞台裏で待っている間９年の歳月をかけ、大掛かりなプロ
ジェクトを手掛けました。それは、一枚の無地の生地に「ニードルペインティング」（刺繍）で、美しい風景を描くものでした。出来上がった作品は、下の写真
でご覧いただける通り、自然と人間が完全に調和して暮らす素晴らしい世界を描いています。それは、大人も子どもも皆が良い行いをしたら世界はきっとこんな
風になるだろうと私が信じる「希望の国」を表現しています。After leaving the ballet, my wife 
and I opened our own dance studio in Berlin. Over the years, we have 
watched many of our students grow from small children into beautiful, 
flourishing women and men with strong values of friendship, courage, and
 helpfulness. Inspired by their positive influences in the world, we 
wish to create a multilingual children's story book intended to empower 
even more children to grow as our students did and make the world a 
better place. Our book, based on the Land of Hope tapestry, would use 
close-up images taken from the needlepainting artwork to tell a story of
 how to grow up to be a strong person by encouraging children to respect others, have courage, and be helpful, along with many other important lessons.Nachdem
 ich das Ballett verliess, zog ich nach Berlin und schloss mich meiner 
Frau an, die dort ein Tanzstudio betrieb. Im Laufe der Jahre wurden wir 
Zeugen, wie aus kleinen Ballettschülern Erwachsene wurden, die als junge
 Männer und Frauen mit Werten wie Freundschaft, Mut und 
Hilfsbereitschaft lebten. Dies inspirierte mich zu der Idee eines 
Kinderbuches, das eine mehrsprachiges Geschichte erzählt. Und vielleicht
 andere Kinder beeinflusst ebenfalls andere zu respektieren, mutig und 
liebevoll zu sein, und die welt zu einem besseren Platz zu machen. Als 
Hintergrund benutze ich Nahaufnahmen des Needlepainting Werkes Land of 
Hope.
バレエの世界を離れた後、私は妻と共にベルリンにスタジオを開きました。そこで私達は、子どもだった生徒達が友情、勇敢、誠実さを大切にする、輝きにあふ
れた大人へと成長し羽ばたいて行く姿を目の当たりにしました。社会で活躍する彼等の姿に私は強く心を動かされ、更に多くの子ども達に、私の生徒達の様に成
長して、より良い世界を作ってほしいと願うようになり、多言語の絵本を作ろうと決心しました。この絵本は、「希望の国」の刺繍のイメージを用いて、人を敬
う事、勇気を持つ事、人に親切に接する事といった大切な人生のレッスンが、子ども達の素晴らしい成長に結びついていくということを物語っています。
Land der Hoffnung, Landschaftsbild mit filigranen Details

The completed Land of Hope, a full landscape in astonishing detail.


「希望の国」の全貌
The StoryDie Geschichte

あらすじ
The
 story focuses on Pepito, a man smaller than a blade of grass. He is 
envious of those around him who are big and strong, and his greatest 
wish is to be like them. He falls asleep one day and wakes up in the 
Land of Hope, where he meets many fascinating creatures. He asks each of
 them how he can become big and strong like them. 
One after 
another, each character gives suggestions to help him become a better 
person, such as having respect for others, giving a helping hand where 
needed, having courage in tough situations, and so on. In the end, 
Pepito realizes that having a big heart is more important than having a 
big body, and that even if he is small he can still make great changes 
in the world. 
Die Geschichte erzählt von Pepito, einem Männlein klein wie ein Grashalm .
 Er ist neidisch auf alle um ihn herum, die groß und kräftig sind, er 
wünscht sich ebenso zu sein. Eines tages erwachte er im Land der 
Hoffnung und trifft dort viele
 faszinierende Wesen. Er fragt jeden, wie er denn groß und stark werden 
könne. Einer nach dem anderen gibt einen Rat und macht Vorschläge, um 
ihm zu helfen. Z.B. Respekt für andere zu haben, anderen in der Not zu 
helfen oder Mut in schwierigen Situationen zu beweisen und so weiter. Am
 Ende versteht Pepito, dass es wichtiger ist ein großes Herz als einen 
großen Körper zu haben, und dass auch ein kleines Männlein große Dinge 
in der Welt bewirken kann!
主人公は、芝生の草よりも背の低いペピートです。彼は、周りにいる大きくて強い男の人たちに憧れています。ペピートの一番の願いは彼等のよ
うに強くてたくましくなる事です。ある日、ペピートが目覚めると、彼は希望の国にいました。そこで彼は、風変わりで素敵な住人たちに出会う度に、どうした
ら強く、大きくなれるか尋ねました。
希望の国の住人達は、ペピートの問いかけに、他者に敬意を持って接する事、困った人を助ける事、困難な状況でも勇気を持って立ち向かう事など様々な
助言をくれました。最後にペピートは、身体が大きいことより、大きな心を持つ方が大事だということ、自分がどんなに小柄でも世の中を大きく変えられるんだ
という事に気がつきました。


One of Horacio's sketches of Pepito. Various images like this one 
will be scattered throughout the pages for children to find - more 
information on the imagined layout can be found further down on this 
page.Dies
 ist eine von Horacio´s Zeichnungen. Dies ist Pepito, der auf vielen 
Seiten auftaucht, wo ihn die Kinder suchen müssen. Mehr Information zum 
Lay-Out  weiter  unten auf deiser seite.


オーラシオが描いたペピートのスケッチ。このようなイメージを絵本の所々に描いて、子ども達に楽しんでもらおうと思っています。絵本のレイアウトに関しては、下記をご覧下さい。

Why is this so important? 
Warum ist dieses Buch wichtig?


このプロジェクトの重要性
It is
 our belief that children cannot get enough positive influences in their
 growing years, so that they can become adults with good values to live 
by. When we raise a child to be good and compassionate, we bring more 
positive energy into the world. It's no secret that there are issues 
that exist around the globe that keep some people from living the best 
life they could have, and by teaching our next generations to be 
compassionate and helpful, we create a force for good that could, with 
time, bring peace to this world. The more we encourage children to have 
strong positive values, the closer we come to bringing the Land of Hope 
off the canvas and into reality.
Wir
 glauben fest daran, dass Kinder garnicht genug positive Einflüsse bei 
ihrer Erziehung erfahren können, um später als Erwachsene ein festes 
Fundament an positiven Glaubenssätzen zu haben. Jedes Kind, das zu 
Mitgefühl erzogen wird, wird selber immer einen positiven Beitrag in 
seinem Leben leisten. Die Welt ist vielerorts in Aufruhr, es gibt 
weltweit ernste Probleme. Da ist es wichtig, den Kindern liebevolle 
Energie und Erziehung zu geben, damit die Welt zu mehr Frieden und 
liebevollem Miteinander findet. Umso mehr Kinder starke positive 
Wertvorstellungen haben, umso eher kann aus dem Land of Hope Realität 
werden!
今
の子ども達は、正しい価値観を持つ大人へと成長する課程において、良い影響を与えられる機会が減っているのではないかと感じています。私たち大人が、思い
やりと正しい心をもつ子どもを育てることができれば、世界にもっと有益な変化をもたらし、社会に貢献できると考えています。今、世界ではさまざまな問題が
起きていて、本来なら手にできるはずの幸せな生活を送れない人々がいます。将来をになう子ども達に、人に対する思いやりを育くみ、大切さを教え伝えること
ができたら、きっといつか、それが世界の平和につながっていくに違いないと考えます。子ども達に強い正義感や前向きに生きていくすばらしさを伝えることが
できたら、この「希望の国」を布の上の刺繍の世界から現実のものに近づけることができるはずです。
We
 are also aiming to make this book multilingual, for two main reasons: 
1) We want Pepito's journey to be accessible to children all over the 
world, not just in English-speaking countries, and 2) exposing children 
to foreign languages at an early age helps them gain an interest in 
other cultures, which helps them develop the ideas of empathy and 
cooperation.  These go well with the other values presented in this 
book, and are especially helpful in our modern global world. Our base 
goal is for English and German, and we are working with a Japanese translator. Perhaps another language could be added if there is
 enough space and interest. We will keep you up-to-date on any 
developments.
Unser
 Ziel ist es, das Buch mehrsprachig heraus zu geben. Das hat mehrere 
Gründe, zum einem kann so Pepitos Geschichte in vielen Ländern gelesen 
und verstanden werden, zum anderen lernen Kinder 
von klein auf, dass es verschiedene Sprachen und Kulturen gibt, deren 
Unterschiedlichkeit wertfrei und selbstverständlich ist. Das ist in der 
globalen Welt von heute sicher von Vorteil. Im 
Moment gibt es die geschichte auf deutsch und englisch, eine japanische 
Übersetzung ist in Planung, auch andere Sprachen können hinzu gefügt 
werden, je nach Platz und Interesse. Wir halten Sie über die Entwicklung auf dem Laufenden,
私は、次に挙げます二つの理由でこの絵本を多国語で出版したいと考えています。まず一つ目は、英語圏だけでなく、世界中の子ども達にペピー
トの冒険を楽しんでもらいたいと思っています。そして二つ目は、子ども達には早くから外国語に触れる機会を与え、自国とは異なる文化に興味を持ち、他者に
対する共感や、協調性を養う事に役立ててほしいと思うからです。

以上二点は、この絵本から学んでもらいたい他の大切な価値観とともに、子ども達がグローバル化が進む現代社会を生きていくために、非常に役立つものだと考
えます。　先ずは、英語、ドイツ語で出版する事が目標ですが、現在、日本語への翻訳も検討中です。賛同・支援して下さる方がいれば、その他の言語への翻訳
も検討したいと思っております。当プロジェクトの進展については、随時ご報告申し上げます。
What We Need
Was wir brauchen


皆様のご支援のお願い

Land
 of Hope has already been fully written, and we are already working with
 a German publishing company, S. Fischer Verlage, to get it out into the
 world. They have given us a price estimate of 7,000 Euro as an absolute
 minimum for production. It's a greater amount than we can afford to pay
 out-of-pocket, which is 
why we are turning to you for help! Every dollar or euro counts. 
Das

 Land der Hoffnung ist bereits fertig geschrieben, und wir sind in 
Kontakt mit einem deutschen Verlagshaus (S. Fischer Verlage). Dort hat 
man uns einen Mindestpreis von 7 500 € für Druck und Vertrieb genannt. 
Leider fehlt uns das nötige geld, so wenden wir uns an Sie - jeder noch 
so kleine Betrag hilft. 
「希望の国」の原稿は、既に出来上がっており、ドイツの出版社、S. Fischer 
Verlageから、絵本を世に送りだす準備を進めています。しかし、出版には、最低でも7,000ユーロの出資を要します。これは、私が個人的に用意で
きる金額を上回るものです。そのため、ぜひ皆様のご支援を頂ければと、今回お願いしております次第です。ご賛同いただきご支援を賜ることができましたら幸
いです。
However,
 our ultimate goal is €13,000 - that would cover editing, printing, 
production, grade-A advertisement, shipping and distribution to 
bookstores around the country, and would also upgrade the book into a 
larger, more child-friendly format. We've read the statistics on 
successful crowdfunding projects and know that a lower number is easier 
to reach, so we're hoping your generosity will go above and beyond our 
minimum goal to help us reach €13,000.
Das
 ultimative Ziel sind 13 000 €, was ausser Druck und allen damit 
verbundenen Kosten wie Versand und Vertrieb eine Top-Grade-A- 
Werbeaktion mit einschliesst. Das Buch könnte so 
auch ein etwas größeres, kinderfreundlicheres Format bekommen. Wir haben
 uns über erfolgreiche Crowdfunding-Projekte informiert und hoffen sehr,
 dass wir es schaffen, die optimale Summe zu erzielen. 
上記の金額は、出版に最低限必要な額であり、編集、印刷、製本、広告、発送、国内外への書籍流通・販売、そして、子ども達にとって親しみや
すい大きめのサイズ、読みやすいフォーマットにするなど、多少の工夫を加えますと、必要経費は13,000ユーロ程度になると概算しております。目標金額
を低めに設定したほうがプロジェクトの成功率が高いという統計を目にしたこともありますが、わたし達としましても、皆様の温かいご支援をいただき、子ども
達のためにより質の高い絵本を届けることができるよう、努力を惜しまない所存です。
Even if you can't 
contribute monetarily to Land of Hope, you can still help us out by 
spreading the word to anyone who may be interested! Sharing, emailing, 
tweeting, and word-of-mouth are absolutely invaluable to getting this 
project off the ground.
Wenn
 Sie im Moment finanziell nicht helfen können, freuen wir uns, wenn Sie 
helfen, indem Sie andere auf das Projekt aufmerksam machen, die 
vielleicht helfen können. Soziale Netzwerke, Emails, Kaffeklasch, 
Mundpropaganda, all dies trägt dazu bei, das Projekt zu verwirklichen. 
「希
望の国」に金銭的なご支援を頂けない場合でも、是非、このプロジェクトの事をお知り合いの方々へ伝えていただけたら幸いです。　情報のシェアリング、E
メールやツイッターを介して、又は、直接お話して頂くだけでも、このプロジェクトの実現に向けて非常にありがたい支援となります。
 This book is perfect for parents of young
 children, expecting parents, or even aunts, uncles, grandparents, and 
other relatives searching for a gift for the young ones in their lives. 
Dieses

Predicted Timeline

想定タイムライン
So, how long is this all going to take?

このプロジェクトのタイムスケジュールは、どの様なものでしょうか。
In a perfect world, the timeline would look something like this:
Wenn alles klappt, sieht der Plan aus wie folgt:

October 31st, 2014: Crowdfunding begins!
Mid-December
 2014: Crowdfunding ends, all funds calculated, collected, and sent to 
publishers. Digital perks sent to supporters - just in time for the 
holidays!
January 2015: Publishing company begins production process for Land of Hope
Summer 2015: Printing is completed, books sent to Horacio and later distributed to bookstores
Summer/Fall 2015: Physical rewards shipped out to supporters, arriving once again just in time for the holidays!
31. Oktober 2014: das Crowdfunding beginnt!
Mitte Dezenber 2014: das Crowdfunding endet, alle Spenden gehen an den 
Verlag, die digitalen Perks (Belohnungen)  gehen an die Spender, 
pünktlich zum Weihnachtsfest!
Januar 2015: der Verlag beginnt die Produktion.
Sommer 2015: der Druck ist fertig, die Bücher werden versendet und an Buchläden verschickt.
Sommer/Herbst 2015: alle nicht-digitalen Perks , d.h. alle Geschenke werden verschickt, pünktlich zum nächsten Fest!
2014年10月31日：クラウドファンディング開始！
2014年12月中旬：クラウドファンディング終了。支援額の計算、出版社に送金。支援者への特典中、ネット上送信できるものは、クリスマス前にお届けします！
2015年1月：出版社「希望の国」絵本制作開始
2015年夏期：印刷・製本終了。オーラシオの手元に本が届けられ、いよいよ書店流通へ。
2015年夏・秋期：デジタル以外の特典を支援者様へ郵送。
Realistically, we know lots of things could happen to 
delay this process. If the crowdfuding isn't as successful as we hope, 
it may take some extra time to scrape up the last bit of money needed to
 pay the publishers. Printing may take longer than expected at the 
publishers, and mailing speeds can sometimes be unpredictable, 
especially internationally and around holidays. We can't know ahead of 
time what might happen, but we promise to keep you informed of all 
updates, good and bad, as soon as we find out about them. 
Es können immer Dinge passieren, die den Ablauf verzögern. Wenn z.B. das
 Crowdfunding nicht den gewünschten Erfolg hat. kann es noch
 dauern, bis wir den Rest zusammen gekratzt haben. Der Druck kann läner 
dauern, Versandzeiten können abweichen (vor allem international). Falls 
eine Verzögerung eintritt, werden alle benachrichtigt sobald wir davon 
Kenntnis haben.
以上は、あくまでも想定しているタイムラインであり、現実的には、様々な原因でプロセスに遅れが出る可能性が考えられます。例えば、当キャ
ンペーン中に集められた支援金が目標額を下回った場合、残りの必要な額を集めて出版社に送金するのに時間がかかったり、印刷が予想以上に長引いたり、郵
送、特にホリデー・シーズン中の海外郵送に時間がかかる事など考えられます。このの様な状況に変更があり次第、責任を持って皆様に随時ご報告致します。

'To his great surprise Pepito met a man who was even smaller then he was.
Pepito said to him: “How can you be happy being so very small?”
And the small man answered: “Because I see that life is full of treasures like this pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.”
“Yes”, said Pepito, “I see. But I want to be big.”
“Good," said the small man, “then you must respect all persons 
whether they are smaller or bigger than you; then you will be big. Come 
with me to the pond for a drink.”'

ここには、僕より小さい住人がいたなんて！

story:
Summary

Last year a lovable little boy, raised by his father, became homeless.  The child chronicled the events in a diary along with the emotional pain and turmoil of going from place to place.  The child now wants to write a children’s book about the experience, “Where Do Homeless Rabbits Go?” 

Simply written, the book describes the events of a father and son rabbit that suffer tragedy and become homeless.  They stick together through love and through support from one another.  The book is about real life courage, tragedy, love and hope.  The child wants to donate his children’s book to homeless shelters for kids to read and understand what homelessness is all about and encourage them that a brighter day is coming.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Any contribution will be appreciated.  To publish the book and distribute it free to homeless shelters, it will cost about $11,500.  This includes production cost, editing fees, postage shipping and book print-binding.

If you contribute the following amount you will get:

$5-up--all donors will have their names added to the a list of sponsors

on the back pages of the book. 

$10-99—a signed thank you note from the author;

$100-199—a copy of the children’s book signed by the author;

$200 and over—a signed book and a copy of the book’s cover suitable for framing signed by the author.

$250+ Painting:  SOLD "Coney Island of my mind" by Frank Dunn.  Acrylic on wood panel ready for hanging. 2' x 2'-- for donation of $250 or more. See here:

 

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=598398203506377&amp;set=a.317342718278595.91470.317312278281639&amp;type=1&amp;theater


$250+ Painting:   "Bay Ridge" by Artist Frank Dunn. Acrylic on wood panel ready for hanging. 2' x 2'-- for donation of $250 or more   All proceeds go to book project.  Ships in 3-4 weeks. USA only.

See painting here:

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=317929944886539&l=21810424dc




$250+ Painting:   "Midtown South" by Frank Dunn.   2'x 2' acrylic on wood panel with wood frame, ready for hanging. Donation of $250 or more. See painting here:

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=5996239...

 



$500--Have the book dedicated to you or a loved one on the dedicated to page.

 

The Impact

Not only will you be able to help this child fulfill his goal of writing a book about his experiences, but you’ll be helping thousands of homeless children cope with the tragedy of being homeless.

story:
There's a Tiger on the Couch!

What would you do if there was a tiger on your couch?

Would you scream and run, or grab a broom and face the beast?

What if that tiger represented your passions? Your dreams? Your deepest desires, and even your fears?

In 2011, after being laid off from another disappearing job, I opened my door and realized I was facing that tiger.

It was time to make a choice. Force myself into an unstable career that didn't excite me, or take the plunge and start building the career I had previously only dreamed of. I decided to make friends with the tiger. 

While trying to get back on my feet financially, I wrote and self-published my first novel, Sapphire, and realized that a career as an author might actually be attainable!  I could fuse my passion for writing with my deep desire to help make a difference in the world. 

So here I am. I currently work on a local organic farm that helps support my climb towards a career as an Author. It often feels like a big scary gamble, but I'm not giving up, and have never been more excited!

I've launched this campaign to help raise the necessary funds to enable me to properly self publish and market my most recently completed book, Following Amur, a comedic spiritual adventure. This novelette has been inspired by my own life's challenges, and I believe, has amazing potential to encourage it's readers to make positive change in their own lives. The story follows a young woman's journey of self discovery as she encounters a witty down-to-earth monk, and mysterious mystical tiger who both have important lessons to impart.  You can read the first (unedited) chapter here!


There's a Monk at the door?

In addition to writing quirky adventure stories, I am committed to helping make a difference in the world, and since a "tiger on the couch" was what started it all for me, what better place to start than with a conservation effort.

There are sadly only 300 Amur (or Siberian tigers) left in the wild. About 3000 total wild tigers, and all together only 10,000 tigers left in the entire world!

To help solve this tragedy, 20% of all profits from Following Amur's sales will be donated to wild tiger conservation. I will regularly post each month's donation to my blog so you can follow the ongoing effort. Together with my readers, we'll help protect the future of this amazing creature, and my muse.

Through all my writing, I aim to inspire others to create positive change in their lives and in the world. By supporting this campaign, you are not only supporting me in this endeavor, but also helping save the tigers. 


What Happens if You Follow the Tiger?

Trying to climb the "Author Mountain" all on your own is like...well, like this kooky little cartoon I drew.

To be honest, I was scared to even ask, but have now come to realize that I need a little help from my friends to make it all happen. I truly feel that Following Amur has incredible potential to jump-start my writing career and propel me to the next level. I'm here asking for your support to get it off the ground.

First: Professional editing: $700

Second: Buying the rights to the book trailer: $200 for the video clips from ShutterStock.

Third: Podcast advertisements: $1500. Facebook advertisements $600. I need at least $2000 to get me started (but of course the more I raise, the more marketing I can do)

Fourth: $1000 for a new (or refurbished) computer and the necessary software. I really didn't want to have to include this in my campaign, but it's becoming a real problem! A quality laptop is a writer's invaluable companion, but my old dinosaur has almost completely bitten the dust. I am currently borrowing a dear friend's old desktop to make this campaign and writing career even possible! I really need a new machine that will allow me to write efficiently, and work on my various graphic design and video projects.

There's a Tiger on the Couch!
What would you do if there was a tiger on your couch?Would you scream and run, or grab a broom and face the beast? What if that tiger represented your passions? Your dreams? Your deepest desires,
and even your fears?In 2011, after being laid off from another disappearing job, I opened my door and realized
I was facing that tiger. It was time to make a choice. Force myself into an unstable career that didn't excite me, or take the plunge and start building the career I had previously only dreamed of. I decided to make friends with the tiger.  
While trying to get back on my feet financially, I wrote and self-published my first
novel, Sapphire, and realized that a career as an author might actually be attainable!  I could fuse my passion for writing with my deep desire to help make a difference in the world.   So here I am. I currently work on a local organic farm that helps support my climb towards a career as an Author. It often feels like a big scary gamble, but I'm not giving up, and have never been more excited!I've launched this campaign to help raise the necessary funds to enable me to properly self publish and market my most recently completed book, Following Amur, a comedic spiritual adventure. This novelette has been inspired by my own life's challenges, and I believe, has amazing potential to encourage it's readers to make positive change in their own lives. The story follows a young woman's journey of self discovery as she encounters a witty down-to-earth monk, and mysterious mystical tiger who both have important lessons to impart.  You can read the first (unedited) chapter here!There's a Monk at the door?
In addition to writing quirky adventure stories, I am committed to helping make a difference in the world, and since a "tiger on the couch" was what started it all for me, what better place to start than with a conservation effort.There are sadly only 300 Amur (or
Siberian tigers) left in the wild. About 3000 total wild tigers, and
all together only 10,000 tigers left in the entire world!To help solve this tragedy, 20% of all profits from Following Amur's sales will be donated to wild tiger conservation. I will regularly post each month's donation to my blog so you can follow the ongoing effort. Together with my readers, we'll help protect the future of this amazing creature, and my muse.

story:
Our Story

In August 2012, Lamprophonic launched as a literary reading series for emerging writers. What began as five Columbia University M.F.A. students sharing short excerpts of their work has grown into a diverse series that has included writers from across the five boroughs and beyond, sharing poetry, fiction, nonfiction, and plays. By now, we've presented almost 100 new voices, and we're not planning on stopping anytime soon.


Now what? 

Embodied in all our work is a mission to encourage a robust, diverse, and supportive literary community in New York City. Building upon the success of our reading series, we now want to create more opportunities for emerging writers.

In March 2015, we hope to launch Literary Speed Dating, an event that will give emerging writers the opportunity to meet with industry experts in low-key, one-on-one conversations. During the course of the event, emerging writers will sit down with five professionals—writers, editors, agents, and teachers—for informal speed dates. This is the writer's time to individualize him/herself, to ask questions, and to learn about what these leaders do and how they got to where they are. After a ten minute ‘date,’ the writer moves down the line. 

In addition to an hour of one-on-one conversations, writers will be encouraged to network amongst themselves and enjoy complimentary food and drinks.

This ticketed event will be a benefit—all proceeds from the night itself will be given to Girls Write Now, a nonprofit organization that provides guidance, support, and opportunities for at-risk and underserved girls from New York City’s public high schools to develop their creative, independent voices, explore careers in professional writing, and learn how to make healthy school, career, and life choices. 

We take our mission seriously, and this is our way to encourage writers at every stage to pay it forward and support a robust community. 


We need your help...

In order to expand our programming and launch Literary Speed Dating, we need to raise some funds. We've estimated that it will cost roughly $5,000 to put on one Literary Speed Dating event. Here's where you can expect your funds to be going: 

  • Venue (estimated ~ $1500)
  • Food and Drink (~ $1500)
  • Administration, Program Materials, & Promotion (~$1200)
  • Equipment & Travel (~$800) 

Lamprophonic has never charged a "submission fee" to be considered for our monthly reading series. We've never charged a cover or instituted a drink minimum at our readings, and we don't intend to start now. Nor do we intend to keep any money raised from Literary Speed Dating; all proceeds will go to Girls Write Now.

We are asking for your help in addressing organizational and programmatic costs. These funds will allow us to put on the event and make it a success,. 


This is just the start. 

Help us launch Lamprophonic into its next phase. We need to mature as an institution so that we can keep creating opportunities for emerging writers and supporting their growth. 

Already, Lamprophonic has facilitated connections among emerging writers that have led to new works published, jobs and internships, and expanded networks. Our readers have founded literary magazines and started reading series of their own. We've celebrated our readers' first books and curated events that further the conversation around them. Critically, we've broken down silos to build a community that extends beyond one's education, background, or form/genre of choice. 

We want to keep doing all this and more. We're building a movement here, and that takes passion more than anything else. If you have no extra pennies to give, consider volunteering and/or sharing our work through your networks.

story:
We founded Essays & Fictions (E&F), a literary biannual, in 2007 with the intention of propagating literature that breaches genre expectations and straddles the boundaries between essay, fiction, and mirage.

E&F now wants to make the transition from literary journal into literary organization, and we need your help. Essays & Fictions Press strives to become an educational non-profit organization that focuses on the same semantic and aesthetic concerns, but on a grander scale. The mission of the press is to explore the hybrid mind, a perspective that coexists in the two spaces of truth-understanding and non-truth-understanding, through the propagation of literature and new media that has an international reach.

We are in the process of building a new website that will improve the presence and visibility of E&F, allowing us to: post podcasts featuring interviews with authors and artists; feature blog-magazine format cultural pieces on the E&F Wire; publish e-Novellas; sponsor educational programs. As well, Essays & Fictions journal will continue to be offered both online and in print, but as a sub-branch of the larger press.

Building a sustainable model for propagating literature that cultivates and celebrates the hybrid mind begins with you, the reader. To set this project in motion, we require initial capital. Your contributions will fund the journal’s publication, advertising expenses, 501c3 filing costs, and seed funds for the e-Novella project. A detailed budget can be found below. 

In 1945, critic and philosopher Theodor Adorno wrote:

"Things have come to a pass where lying sounds like truth, truth like lying. Each statement. each piece of news, each thought has been performed by the centers of the culture industry. Whatever lacks the familiar trace of such pre-formation lacks credibility, the more so because the institutions of public opinion accompany what they send forth by a thousand factual proofs and all the plausibility that total power can lay hands on. Truth that opposes these pressures not only appears improbable, but is in addition too feeble to make any headway in competition with their highly-concentrated machinery of dissemination."

Almost 70 years later, what Adorno predicted has come to pass. The humanities have been eclipsed by empiricism and the cult of usefulness, encroaching on the study of alternative ontologies and ways of knowing. In mainstream media, critics of political economy have been relegated to extremist roles as the "threadbare ideologies" of the market weave living false histories. E&F seeks and publishes work that explores, annihilates, and celebrates new spaces of unknowing that arise in this turbulent cloud of mixed information.

We encourage you to read E&F online at essaysandfictions.com. Our work will continue to be made available to the public, free of charge. We are proponents of elitism in literature, but of elitism with access. 

Acclaim for Essays & Fictions

"The very title, Essays & Fictions, indicates the originality of this review. Some of the most essential prose written today, worldwide, lies "between the genres": prose which belongs sensu stricto neither to the novel, nor to the short story, nor to the prose poem, nor to the essay, nor to the memoir, yet which partakes of some or all of these in form and contents. There is also a nuance to be defined between what is commonly called the 'personal essay' and what Essays & Fictions is seeking and has published. That nuance is Literature with a capital "L." As a critic specialized in European writing, I have long reviewed such prose. As a translator of Greek and French literature, I have sometimes attempted to render it in English. My versions of unclassifiable prose texts by two important European poets, Veroniki Dalakoura and Philippe Jaccottet, found a home in Essays & Fictions. For this I am grateful as well as for the discoveries that the review enables me to make. Kudos to the editors for their openness and perspicacity!" 
– John Taylor

In 2011, Essays & Fictions received an honorable recognition in Best American Essays for the publication of John Edwards’ breach work “Revolutionary Wrath: A (Seriously) Biased Revision of the Burr vs. Hamilton Duel Based on an Old High School Term Paper.”

Important works we have published include Robert Wexelblatt's pseudo-academic "A Keynote Address by Sidney Fein," John D'Amico's fictionalized "Letter from Michel Foucault to Daniel Defert," and Joseph Michael's imaginative biography "Michiko Kakutani and the Sadness of the World!" We're also proud of smart fiction such as Emily Culliton's "A Season of Meat Pie Selling" and Charles Lowe's "A Flowered Rag," as well as hybrid poetry/memoir works such as Leora Fridman's "Expertise" and some of the first published English translations of the work of Swiss-French poet Philippe Jaccottet.
