story:
MeKah's Mission

Peace & Love to You Dear Reader. My name is MeKah & I am a Writer, Aspiring Inspirational Speaker, Spoken Word Artist & Mother of 6 Beautiful Daughters.

I am also a survivor of child molestation, rape, domestic violence & the welfare system.

Sadly, my life-story is not unique.

I am not the only survivor of such evils.

Inside Every Woman There Is A Story Waiting To Be Told &

I Want To Help You Tell Yours.


MeKah's Mission is to develop a center for self-empowerment & healing where women can share their S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories.

Every woman carries a story of Strength, Inspiration, Sacrifice, Transformation, Redemption, Revelation & Self-Love inside of her.

We must share these stories with each other in order to increase the level of communication & understanding between the younger & older generations. As well as lighten the mental, physical, emotional & spiritual baggage we carry, so that we can begin the great work of healing the wounds inflicted upon womanhood.

We women must shine a light into all the dark corners in the locked closets of our hearts by exposing the painful experiences we have had to endure & show how we have been able to carry on in spite of them.

We must also tell the stories of joy, love, hope, faith, courage & triumph, so that we will be able to heal ourselves, our families & our communities. So please, help us by funding our campaign, supporting our organization, contributing your story, spreading the word & encouraging others do the same.


MeKah's Mission will be using the proceeds from this campaign, & profits from our book sales to:

  • Cover relevant business costs outlined in further detail below

  • Give out 918 Copies Each of our Anthology, (Our S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories) & Our Self-Help Manual, (M.A.K.E. Y.O.U.R. M.A.R.K. How to Tap Into Your Hidden S.T.A.R. Power), to Michigan Area Women & Children Homeless Shelters, Domestic Violence Shelters, Teen Runaway Centers & other Women Centered Organizations. (Please Feel Free To Make Referrals to Organizations)

  • Provide 918 Workshop Vouchers (Payment Assistance for Low Income Workshop Participants)

  • Purchase/Lease a facility for our organization, MeKah's Empowerment Center for Conscious Communication Activation & Healing, AKA M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 for short.

Having our own facility will enable us to reach more women & families by providing a meeting place where women can fellowship & empower themselves through open, honest, conscious communication amongst each other free of judgement, prejudice, social stigmatization & religious persecution.

While M.E.C.C.A.H 918 chooses to focus primarily on issues concerning women & their families, we welcome EVERYONE who desire positive change, enlightenment & creation of mutually beneficial relationships within their community.


MeKah's Mission Plan of Action & Due Dates:

I: Our 1rst Annual Publication Project

Anthology: Our S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories

A Series of books Dedicated to the Power & Majesty of Femininity

A three part anthology of survival & self-empowerment told by women from all walks of life.

Due: December 12, 2012 (12-12-12)

 

II: Launch of M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 Self-Empowerment, Enrichment & Development Series

* M.A.K.E. Y.O.U.R. M.A.R.K.

   How to Tap into Your Hidden S.T.A.R. Power

* The A.L.L. S.T.A.R. T.E.A.M. Effect

   Being, the Center of Intention

(The Primary Manuals for M.E.C.C.A.H.'s Webinars, Seminars, Classes & Sessions)

Due: January 26, 2013 (01-26-13)

 

III: M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 Grand Opening (Location To Be Announced)

MeKah's Empowerment Center for Conscious Communication Activation & Healing

Our Credo is:

Your Life, Your Choice, Your Power, Your Voice!

Due: March 08, 2013 (03-08-13)

 

What Your Support Will Help Us Do:


Publishing, Printing & Distrubution including:

Books & Manuals

Bar Codes & ISBNs

Promotional Items & Participation Certificates

Seminar, Workshop & Group Session Materials

Workshop Attendance Vouchers:

(Payment Assistance for Low Income Workshop Particpants)

 

Professional Services including:

Editing & Cover Design

Marketing & Advertising

Image Consultant & Event Planning

Media & Public Relations

Photography & Videography

Web Design & Site Maintenance

 

Business Expenses including:

Legal & Accounting Fees

Presentation Equipment & Office Supplies

M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 Facility Purchase/Lease

Payroll & Volunteer Stipends

Membership & Association Fees (i.e. Joining NAWBO-National Association of Women Business Owners, MCC -MI Chamber of Commerce & Toastmasters)

Transportation & Travel Costs (To Deliver & Distribute Books & Manuals s well as Assist M.E.C.C.A.H. Attendees Lacking Transportation)

 

Meet & Greet Celebration Event (Location & Time To Be Announced)

Venue & Decorations

Tickets & Invitations

Food & Drinks

M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 Goodie Bags & Party Favors For All Attendees

 

What You Get

S.T.A.R. PACK: $5

We'll give you a Certificate of Appreciation & put your name on our Gold STAR Contributor List on Our Cool New Re-designed Website.
(Which we'll be getting thanks to you!)


S.T.A.R. PACK PLUS: $10

We'll give you a Certificate of Appreciation & put your name on our

Gold STAR Contributor List on Our Cool New Re-designed Website.
(Which we'll be getting thanks to you!)

PLUS we'll throw in a Snazzy Looking: Gold Star Pin


S.T.A.R. PACK BFF: $20

We'll put you on our Contributor List on Our Cool New Re-designed Website.
(Which we'll be getting thanks to you!)

Plus we'll throw in:

A Certificate of Appreciation &
A Gold Star Pin
For You & A Friend of Your Choice!


SUPER S.T.A.R. PACK: $25

S.T.A.R. PACK Contents & An Advanced E-Book Copy of Our Anthology:

Our S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories


MEGA S.T.A.R. PACK: $50

S.T.A.R. PACK PLUS Contents, An Advanced E-Book Copy of Our Anthology &

An Advanced Paperback Copy of Our Anthology:

Our S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories


GIANT S.T.A.R. PACK: $100

S.T.A.R. PACK BFF Contents, An Advanced E-Book Copy of Our Anthology &

An Advanced Paperback Copy of Our Anthology:

Our S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories

(BUT WAIT....Your Friend Gets A Set Too! Aren't You the Generous One!)


NOVA S.T.A.R. STATUS: $250

SIGNED & NUMBERED LIMITED EDITION HARD COVER VERSION OF OUR ANTHOLOGY:
Our S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories
 
A CUSTOM ENGRAVED DISTINCTIVE STAR TROPHY AWARD
 
YOUR NAME INSCRIBED ON A SEPARATE HONOR WALL PLAQUE AT OUR M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 FACILITY
 
PLUS A TICKET TO OUR MEET & GREET CELEBRATION IN SEPTEMBER


SUPERNOVA STATUS: $500

FANCY TOP STAR CUSTOM ENGRAVED TROPHY AWARD

YOUR NAME INSCRIBED ON A SEPARATE HONOR WALL PLAQUE AT OUR M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 FACILITY

PLUS A PERSONALLY AUTOGRAPHED LIMITED EDITION HARD COVER VERSION OF OUR ANTHOLOGY: Our S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories

FOR YOU & A LOVED ONE OF YOUR CHOICE

PLUS 2 TICKETS TO OUR MEET & GREET CELEBRATION IN SEPTEMBER


HYPERNOVA STATUS: $1,000

SHINING STAR TROPHY AWARD

YOUR NAME INSCRIBED ON THE HONOR WALL PLAQUE AT OUR M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 FACILITY

PLUS A PERSONALLY AUTOGRAPHED LIMITED EDITION HARD COVER VERSION OF OUR ANHTOLOGY: Our S.I.S.T.E.R.S. Stories FOR YOU & A LOVED ONE OF YOUR CHOICE

PLUS-PLUS 4 TICKETS TO OUR MEET & GREET CELEBRATION IN SEPTEMBER

AND A PERSONALLY HANDWRITTEN THANK YOU LETTER FROM MEKAH
(NOT JUST SOME LITTLE RINKY DINK THANK YOU NOTE CARD EITHER...I'M TALKING ABOUT AN OLD FASHIONED, 2 PAGE HANDWRITTEN LETTER DELIVERED TO YOU IN PERSON!)

 

This is the area where I'm supposed to tell you what we'll do with the funds IF we don't reach our goal. Well, I BELIEVE we WILL reach our goal! As a matter of fact, I expect us to EXCEED our goal! So, everything we said we're going to do above, that is EXACTLY what we're going to do!

But, since it IS your money we're asking you for & we want you to have Peace of Mind & Feel Good about where your money is being spent, here is our contigency plan in case we don't meet our goals:

Well, after I throw a 10 minute pity party & have myself a good hearty cry, I plan to dry my eyes & press onward with the mission without a facility:

  • Continue to run the operation out of my home, servicing as many people As I can, When I can.

  • Give out as many books, manuals & vouchers as possible

  • Scale Down Our Meet & Greet Event

  • Launch another fundraising campaign, sell books  & provide services until We raise enough capital to complete our mission.

  • In Other Words...We Will Persevere... :-D

 

How You Will Help Us Make A Difference

MeKah's Mission will Provide an Outlet of Communication & Healing for Women in the community. There are so many stories out there that must be shared and utilized. Women need to feel empowered in order to be strong, healthy & capable role models for themselves as well as their familes.

Once M.E.C.C.A.H. 918 has it's own facility, we will be able to assist even more women and their families in the Metro Detroit area with resources, methods & tools such as; Yoga, Meditation, Ayurvedic Medicine, Holistic Healing, Organic Nutrition, Emotional Freedom Technique and the like, that provide a more thorough approach to the self-empowerment & healing process.

By Creating

Stronger, Healthier, Happier Women

We Create,

Stronger, Healthier, Happier Families

Which Creates

Stronger, Healthier, Happier Communities!

 

Other Ways You Can Help Besides Giving Money

  • SPREAD THE WORD

  • CHECK BACK OFTEN FOR UPDATES & SURPRISES

  • CONTRIBUTE YOUR PERSONAL STORY TO OUR ANTHOLOGY

  • ENCOURAGE SOMEONE YOU KNOW TO CONTRIBUTE THEIR STORY

  • SPREAD THE WORD BY SENDING OUT OUR LINKS & TELLING EVERYONE!

  • DOWNLOAD & SHARE OUR FREE NEWSLETTERS

  • FOLLOW US ON TWITTER

  • GET OTHERS TO SPREAD THE WORD

  • READ, LIKE & SHARE OUR BLOGS

  • SEND REFERRALS TO & ABOUT MEKAH'S MISSION & M.E.C.C.A.H. 918

  • CLICK ON OUR WEBSITE FOR SUBMISSION DETAILS & OTHER GOODIES!

  • DID I MENTION SPREAD THE WORD?

  • PLEASE USE THE INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOLS THEY HAVE SO GENEROUSLY PROVIDED FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE

 

IN THE MISSION!!!

I Thank You On Behalf of ALL WOMEN EVERYWHERE for Your Generous Heart, Caring Spirit, Love, Support & Concern You Have Shown for US.

story:
¿Qué?

Mis tres ángeles narra las tribulaciones que pudiéramos haber pasado en busca de la felicidad.

Blanca es una joven adolescente que, tras pasar varios años de malas experiencias en un instituto, decide cambiarse a otro para cursar allí el Bachillerato. Si bien su vida realiza un giro completo y empieza a ser feliz, las cosas no siempre salen como nos gustaría. Su padre sufre un trágico accidente y se ve forzada a abandonar su casa.

Marta la acoge en su casa, pero, al enterarse de que ha comenzado a sus espaldas un romance con el joven y apuesto Rodrigo, la echa sin remordimiento alguno.

Ante esta situación, el único remedio que le queda a Blanca es acudir a Rodrigo y pedirle quedarse en su casa; quien acepta desde el primer momento. Ambos comienzan a vivir juntos y establecen su relación. Pero de nuevo, cuando menos se lo esperan, algo vuelve a hacer que sus vidas den un giro de ciento ochenta grados...

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Juan José García Izquierdo.

Nacido en el año 1995, en Madrid, actualmente se encuentra en tercero de carrera de Estudios Ingleses en la Universidad Autónoma de Madrid.

Apasionado por la lectura y el ámbito de las letras, siempre se ha querido dedicar a la rama de la filología. Su sueño en el ambiente laboral es llegar a trabajar como profesor de inglés en los cursos de Educación Secundaria, a pesar de que su mayor sueño es llegar a ser escritor.

Lleva escribiendo pequeños relatos y alguna novela desde los 18 años y siempre ha tenido la ilusión de tener una publicación. A pesar de las dos publicaciones en distintas antalogías de microrrelatos, esta es su primera novela publicada.

J.J.G. Izquierdo se ha propuesto mostrarnos esa otra cara de la vida.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 700€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Mis tres ángeles que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y J.J.G. Izquierdo vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
THE VAMPIRE ALICE

or Through the Looking Glass and what the Vampire Alice Found There

by Paul Voodini via Lewis Carroll

Based upon Lewis Carroll's classic 1871 Through the Looking Glass and What Alice Found There, The Vampire Alice book gives the story a dark, gothic, grown-up twist. For in this version Alice is a vampire, and the world she encounters on the other side of the mirror is a decidedly gothic, grotesque, and dangerous one. While still possessing the whimsy and fairy tale quality of the original, this re-imagining brings oodles of blood and monstrous darkness into play. Make no mistake, while this book is at times both amusing and enchanting, it is also downright gory! Alice is a vampire. She feeds on blood and thrives on the erotic tension her feeding creates.

On the eve of the ceremonial burning at the stake of a great werewolf, Alice journeys through the looking glass to a dark, menacing world. In this strange world she appears to be followed (or is that stalked?) by an ancient werewolf, until the reason why the fates of werewolves and the fates of vampires are so often bound up together is revealed to her.

Throughout the book, The Vampire Alice is portrayed in several photographs by Lexie Lambert.

Excerpt from the book:

Chapter 1. Looking Glass House.

One thing was certain, that the girl with the blonde hair had nothing to do with it – it was the girl with the black hair's fault entirely. For the blonde girl had been having her blood sucked out of her by the old Mistress vampire for the last quarter of an hour (and bearing it pretty well, considering); so you see that she couldn't have had any hand in the mischief.

 The way the Mistress sucked mortal's blood was this: first she held the poor thing down by its hair with one mighty hand, and then with the other hand she twisted the head to one side, revealing the juicy flesh of the neck, into which her bright white fangs bit and onto which her lips attached like terrible suckers; and just now, as I had said, she was hard at work on the blonde girl, who was lying quite still and trying not to moan – no doubt feeling confused as to why the act of dying should feel so erotic.

But the girl with the black hair had been tied up all afternoon, and was meant to be Alice's meal. But Alice was feeling both restless and tired and not in the slightest bit hungry, and so she was sitting curled up in a corner of the great armchair, half talking to herself and half asleep. However the black haired girl kept trying to escape, and occasionally managed to free herself of the ropes that bound her, so that Alice had to climb out of the chair and sleepily slap her around a bit before tying her back up. 

 “Oh you wicked little thing!” cried Alice, catching up with the girl, and giving her a kiss to make her understand that she was in disgrace. “Really, you ought to have better manners. You must be eighteen winters old by now, and I would have thought that your parents would have taught you to behave more appropriately in civilised company!” she added, looking reproachfully at the girl, and speaking in as cross a voice as she could manage – and then she scrambled back into the chair, this time taking the girl with her, and deciding that perhaps she was hungry after all, she started to lick the girl's neck. But she didn't get on very fast, as she was talking all the time, sometimes to the girl, and sometimes to herself. The girl sat very demurely on her knee, pretending to not to look at Alice, and now and then putting out one hand towards her blonde haired friend, as if she could help her in the slightest.

Due to the dark and gothic nature of this re-imagining of the classic Lewis Carroll book, it is not recommended for children. The book features references to vampires feeding in a fantasy setting (as can be read in the excerpt above).Therefore it is recommended that this book be for teenagers and adults only.

Join the Vampire Alice as she embarks on her journey into a looking glass world populated by a giant werewolf, the Queen of England, the King of the Holy See, the Elephant Man, and Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde!

"Will you take tea?" the werewolf enquired of Alice.

"Dearest werewolf, I am a vampire," replied Alice. "I only take blood."

"Oh really," smiled the werewolf. "One lump or two?"

"Oh, however it comes," said Alice. "Please don't think I need it putting through a strainer or anything so fancy. I am quite partial to the occasional chewy bit."


This project is supported by two Facebook pages: 

The Victorian Academy of Magick

Vampire Survivors

If you don't currently follow these pages, please pop over and 'like' them once you've made your pledge.

At the launch of the project, the text is approximately 40% complete and will be finalised over the coming months. We have set a realistic timescale for getting the book typeset and printed and shipped out to our backers. If we do encounter any problems along the way, you will be kept fully informed. We see you as a true partner in the creation of this amazing project. Please help to us to make Vampire Alice a reality!


Model: Lexie Lambert

Makeup by Elaine Fitzgerald Styling by Carlene Olivia Photography by Binn Buameanchol

story:
Thank You!

We are 128% funded thanks to generous and enthusiastic supporters! 

Please visit our blog to pre-order a First Edition of The Dandelion Insurrection. http://www.risingsundancetheater.com/wpblog/?page_id=413

If you are interested in ordering multiple copies for a reading group or book club, please send us an email (info@risingsundancetheater.com) Our official release of the novel is in mid-October. Author/Actress Rivera Sun has been writing a wild and indomitable piece to read for the release party at her local bookstore in Taos, NM and will live stream the performance to her far-off friends! Many blessings and thank you! 

Be kind. Be connected. Be unafraid.

Praise for The Dandelion Insurrection

"This is THE handbook for the coming revolution!" -Lo Daniels, editor, Dandelion Salad

"I predict it will be a major contributor to the change in history that WE are all being called to write together." -Malathy Drew

"You are a great part of today's MOVEMENT!" -Joe Hock, organizer

"The words penetrate the mind, heart, and soul of the reader in a way that is powerful and captivating." -Rebecca Blackwell

"A life-changing novel ... that describes how we, the people, could take our rights back from the powers that be (politicians, bureaucrats, and the corporate fatcats who own them) by peaceful action." -Karen Lane

"With all its twists of plot, and myriad of characters, it is not only entertaining, it offers a lot of insights as to how the citizens of the US can reclaim their country from the corporations and political stooges which have taken it over." -Guadamour, reviewer


What if you could help publish the next great novel?

Join the Dandelion Insurrection!

You can become a part of the community that publishes The Dandelion Insurrection!

The Grapes of Wrath, 1984, The Jungle . . . in times of crisis, visionary authors write passionate rallying cries for justice and change. It takes courageous people to publish their books. Together, they can change the world. Now it's our turn.

Let's tell a story of love and revolution!

"When fear is used to control; love is how we rebel!"

From the desk of Rivera Sun comes a novel about the refusal of the human heart to submit to destructive authority. 

"In a time that looms around the corner of today, in a place on the edge of our nation."

Under a gathering storm of tyranny, Zadie Byrd Gray whirls into the life of Charlie Rider and asks him to become the voice of the Dandelion Insurrection. With the rallying cry of life, liberty, and love, Zadie and Charlie fly across America leaving a wake of revolution in their path. Passion erupts. Danger abounds. The lives of millions hang by a thin thread of courage, but in the midst of the madness, the golden soul of humanity blossoms . . . and miracles start to unfold!

"The Dandelion Insurrection is as small as baking bread in your oven, and as large as bringing down dictators."

The Dandelion Insurrection is the story of nonviolent revolution in the United States. This book offers through its story many tools and strategies developed by countless leaders throughout history, including Gandhi, Dr. King, Cesar Chavez, and Professor Gene Sharp. From marches to cazerolazo pot-and-pan protests to strikes to Victory Gardens for the People; the Dandelion Insurrection shares ideas that have changed the world. (You can see a sneak peak of the book in our gallery!)

"Be like the dandelions, spring up in intolerable soils, dare to stand up against violence, and blossom into love!"

"A masterpiece; wild adventure you hope will never end!"

Calling All Dandelions! Read the book and spread the word!

A message from Rivera Sun . . .

The Dandelion Insurrection officially releases in October . . . but I've got a special Advance Reader's Edition hot-off-the-press and ready for you! Read it before anyone else and tell everyone you know! Be part of the adventure of releasing the First Edition! Share the quotes, stick a bumper sticker on your car (or bicycle), tell a friend, support the publishing of the First Edition, donate to the vision; there are many ways to join in the fun! I welcome every bit of participation, large or small, and thank you all deeply from the bottom of my heart. A literary legend arises from the love of readers like you!

Thank you! I am honored to be part of the new generation of 'interdependent' authors that have moved beyond 'independent' to embrace our connection to our readers and supporters. The Dandelion Insurrection is a 'Community Published Book' made possible by people like you!

"Everywhere the concrete of control paves over the goodness of the heart, the Dandelion Insurrection springs up through the cracks."

The Love and Revolution Fund!

In addition to the various 'perks', there is a category called the Love and Revolution Fund. This is the place where mystery and magic converge and anything can happen. Give one hundred and eight dollars, give a thousand and eight, or give a million. All donations to this category go towards spreading the seeds of the Dandelion Insurrection . . . library copies, book tours, reading groups, speaking appearances, and much more! Here's your chance to give generously to the unlimited potential of the Dandelion Insurrection. The Universe thanks you deeply. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you'd like to offer something beyond value - ideas, inspirations, ways to get the word out - or even if you have only love to offer, send me an email: info@risingsundancetheater.com or contact me on Facebook (Rivera Sun) and Twitter (@RiveraSunAuthor). Everyone is appreciated on this journey!

Thank You! Every gift is a blessing. As the saying goes,

Be Kind!  Be Connected!  Be Unafraid!  The Dandelion Insurrection is here!

Be kind. Be connected. Be unafraid.



Praise for The Dandelion Insurrection

"This is THE handbook for the coming revolution!" -Lo Daniels, editor, Dandelion Salad
"I predict it will be a major contributor to the change in history that WE are all being called to write together." -Malathy Drew
"You are a great part of today's MOVEMENT!" -Joe Hock, organizer
"The words penetrate the mind, heart, and soul of the reader in a way that is powerful and captivating." -Rebecca Blackwell
"A life-changing novel ... that describes how we, the people, could take our rights back from the powers that be (politicians, bureaucrats, and the corporate fatcats who own them) by peaceful action." -Karen Lane
"With all its twists of plot, and myriad of characters, it is not only entertaining, it offers a lot of insights as to how the citizens of the US can reclaim their country from the corporations and political stooges which have taken it over." -Guadamour, reviewer

What if you could help publish the next great novel?

Join the Dandelion Insurrection!


You can become a part of the community that publishes The Dandelion Insurrection!
The Grapes of Wrath, 1984, The Jungle . . . in times of crisis, visionary authors write passionate rallying cries for justice and change. It takes courageous people to publish their books. Together, they can change the world. Now it's our turn.
Let's tell a story of love and revolution!

"When fear is used to control; love
is how we rebel!"
From the desk of Rivera Sun comes a novel
about the refusal of the human heart to submit to destructive authority. 
"In a time that looms around the
corner of today, in a place on the edge of our nation."
Under a gathering storm of tyranny, Zadie
Byrd Gray whirls into the life of Charlie Rider and asks him to become the
voice of the Dandelion Insurrection. With the rallying cry of life, liberty,
and love, Zadie and Charlie fly across America leaving a wake of revolution in
their path. Passion erupts. Danger abounds. The lives of millions hang by a
thin thread of courage, but in the midst of the madness, the golden soul of
humanity blossoms . . . and miracles start to unfold!
"The Dandelion Insurrection is as
small as baking bread in your oven, and as large as bringing down
dictators."
The Dandelion Insurrection is the story of
nonviolent revolution in the United States. This book offers through its
story many tools and strategies developed by countless leaders throughout
history, including Gandhi, Dr. King, Cesar Chavez, and Professor Gene Sharp.
From marches to cazerolazo pot-and-pan protests to strikes to Victory Gardens
for the People; the Dandelion Insurrection shares ideas that have changed the
world. (You can see a sneak peak of the book in our gallery!)
"Be like the dandelions,
spring up in intolerable soils, dare to stand up against violence, and
blossom into love!"
"A masterpiece; wild adventure you
hope will never end!"

story:
Introduction

Hopefully you will all have watched the video. The video gives you some background to my story. Hi, My name is Steve and for 9 years I was bullied. I was bullied by both male and female individuals and after hitting a low point I turned my life around.  I appeared on LIVE National television in the hope of telling others what had happened to me and to help others to not go through what I did. 

When I was being bullied the first thing that wanted was help and advice.  

My campaign is to write a book called 'Lollipops and A** whopping's' which will be written by me. The book will cover my story - including all it's ups and downs before going on to giving advice, knowledge and key insights that I hope young people will fine helpful. I'm not doing this to make myself money but rather to help individuals - those being bullied, those bullying others but also the bystanders. I have a personal motto - To be the Light in someone's darkness. All it takes is one person - Just one to make a difference, to be the light. 

I need a minimum of £500 to write the book - for me to go away and write over a week everything. Some may say why not just write? The truth is when I will write this book I will have to rake over old memories and it will be upsetting. I've put my family through them already. This money will give me a chance to write the book and complete the first stage. 

10-20% of all proceed's from eventual book sales will go bullies out. (www.bulliesout.com) They have one key aim - For all young people to recognise their self-worth and potential and to flourish in a positive, caring environment free from oppression and abuse. 

They as an organisation, have achieved some truly remarkable things and I hope that once the book is written and published that they will get the proceeds to fun their work. The other 80% will go on costs and will be reinvested for future projects. 

The Funding

As said above I need a minimum of £500 to make this campaign happen. All money raised whether we meet our target or not will go towards the book. I've set up a small group called 'The Crazy Owl Group' which brings together volunteers and remarkable individual's to help edit and market the book and they will ensure that all money is put to good use. If we raise over our target that means we can do more amazing things - like purchase a web domain, market materials etc. 


So there you have it - everything that you should need to know but in case you need more information then please do let me know. You can contact me through this campaign or via steve.sellers@hotmail.co.uk. And Thank you in advance for all your support and pledges. 


Steve Sellers

story:
The Forgotten by Saruuh Kelsey

The Forgotten is the first book in a series called The Lux Guardians. The Lux Guardians is a young adult dystopian/urban fantasy series that tells the tale of Branwell and Bennet, twins from Victorian London, and Honour and Horatia, twins who live in Forgotten London - a future wreck of the city we all know and love.

Full summary:

Honour and Horatia Frie are twins living in a world of wreck and ruin.

Forgotten London is a dismal place of containment, rationing, and a four-family-per-house regulation. Twenty five years ago the world was set ablaze when solar flares obliterated three quarters of the Earth’s population and wiped out whole continents in one blow. The flares brought with them The Sixteen Strains: agonizing and fatal diseases that plague each of the forty one zones of Forgotten London and the rest of the world. The only places that escaped fatal damage were two countries now known as The Cities – States and Bharat. The rest of the world – The Forgotten Lands – is contained within borders for the people’s protection against even deadlier Strains outside the barrier. But fifteen year old Honour thinks differently. He thinks that they’re kept inside the fence for other, more menacing reasons. He thinks that States are planning to kill them.

Branwell and Bennet Ravel are twins living in a world of danger and secrecy.

In Victorian London, years before the solar flares hit, the Ravels’ world has just been turned upside down. Their father, poisoned by something even genius Branwell can’t determine, has passed away. His dying words were unnerving orders to keep each other safe no matter the cost, and to hide everything he has ever invented. When one of his creations goes missing – a device named The Lux that can generate unlimited energy – the twins are shocked to discover that their very own government has stolen it and, according to their father’s journals, are planning to use it to create unfathomable explosions to destroy their world.

The Ravel twins will have to find and reclaim The Lux if they are to stop their world’s planned destruction, but when they’re transported to an unfamiliar, derelict world, the search for the device will become harder than ever. Honour and Horatia, against all odds, will have to find a way to stop States before the remainder of Earth is eradicated and their world is lost for good, or somehow get every single citizen of Forgotten London outside of the fence.

 

About the author

I've been writing fiction for as long as I can remember, always creating characters and fictional settings inside my head. Only within the past three years did I begin writing novels. It’s always been a dream of mine to have my work published, and to have people read it. I’ve so often been changed and deeply affected by a writer’s words. Now I want to do that for other people.

My big dream is to release The Lux Guardians for free so that others can read and access my writing without having to pay a fortune, or anything at all! I know how annoying it is when you want to read a book but you don't have enough money to actually buy the book. I don’t want that for my readers. And because of this, I’m skipping the literary agent and the editor and the publisher and all of that costly stuff, and doing it all myself (with the help of my family and my talented writer friends) and going straight to getting the book out to you.

 

About the project

If this project is fully funded, which I really hope it will be!, then I will be able to produce a mere seventy five books in paperback (as well as being able to afford your perks and rewards), but it’s a start and it means I can get my words out to seventy five people who wouldn’t otherwise have them. And of course to you as well!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Ideally, I’d ask for enough money to produce two hundred books, but the $1800 target looks especially daunting to me, and I’ve opted to keep things a little more reachable so at the very least I can give away some books.  With the target money, I can get seventy five 5.5 x 8.5 inch softcover books printed, a small number of limited hardcover books to give away in the perks bundles, as well as the other goodies that are available.

As you can see it’s a small amount of books to aim for, but any money I receive will be put into ensuring at least one person gets my book. So even if at the end of this I make $25, it will be a success in my eyes!

 

Rewards!

And now the most exciting part, and the bit you’re most interested in.

Anyone who donates, absolutely anyone, will have their name listed in the acknowledgements section in the back of the book as a special thank you for helping make this project happen. Also available are four exclusive stickers that feature the main characters of the novel, an exclusive bookmark, an ebook of the finished novel, a signed and numbered paperback, a signed and numbered hardback, an ebook of side stories that have never and will never be found anywhere but here, and (most excitingly) a minor character named after you, or named anything you choose!

The stickers will be round and feature this design (the one in the coloured border):

 

And the bookmark will look like this: 

 

[Note: this shows the front and the back of the bookmark, not two different bookmarks

And: The books will be shipped to you when they are complete next June (this is just an estimate of the time it will take to finalise, review, edit, edit, edit a thousand times, and print the book. It could change.)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, please, please, even if you can’t donate $1, tell everyone you know about my campaign. Let everyone know about my aim, and tell them that if they fund me they could get a free book in the not so distant future! Or just shout free books! at all your friends; it’ll get their attention for sure.

I will be so so grateful for anyone that helps this cause, be it donating a little, a lot, people who tell other people and promote my campaign, well-wishers, friends, supporters – everyone.

story:
for the English version see below   

Tre Ragazzi a zonzo

Ciao a tutti,
Noi siamo Aldi, Matteo e Antonio, i RakiRush, tre ragazzi con una passione in comune: viaggiare.

Di recente abbiamo avuto un'idea, condividere con gli altri il nostro interesse ed usarlo per fare qualcosa di buono, aiutare la ricerca  scientifica sulla Distrofia Muscolare, condotta dal “Centro Dino Ferrari”, dell’Università degli Studi di Milano. 
Così ecco il nostro progetto:
viaggeremo attraverso i Balcani in macchina e dormiremo in tenda. Giorno per giorno riprenderemo la nostra avventura con una videocamera.
Una volta tornati a casa pubblicheremo tutti i video sul nostro canale Youtube.
I soldi che riusciremo a raccogliere dalle visualizzazioni saranno interamente donati al Centro Dino Ferrari di Milano.

Il  “Centro Dino Ferrari” dell’Università degli Studi di Milano, Fondazione IRCCS Cà Granda, Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico di Milano,  si occupa di ricerca clinica e scientifica nel campo delle malattie muscolari e neurodegenerative.


Il nostro viaggio comincerà domenica 21 Settembre, partendo dalla nostra casa a Rapolano Terme, in provincia di Siena, attraverseremo Slovenia, Croazia, Bosnia, Montenegro, Kosovo per giungere infine l' Albania.

Tra i luoghi fantastici che avremo occasione di visitare ci sono:
  • le Grotte di Postumia (Slovenia)

  • il Parco nazionale dei laghi di Plitvice (Croazia)

  • Mostar (Bosnia ed Erzegovina)

  • il Durmitor National Parck (Montenegro)

  • Prizren (Kosovo)

  • il parco di Theth (Albania)

e tanti altri!

Qui potete trovare la nostra pagina 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheRakiRush

E qui quella di twitter: https://twitter.com/therakirush

“Centro Dino Ferrari”: www.amicicentrodinoferrari.com


A voi la palla!

Nel mentre che stiamo compiendo questo viaggio abbiamo pensato che potesse essere utile dare anche a voi la possibilità di contribuire in modo da raccogliere più fondi possibili.
Questo è il motivo per il quale abbiamo creato questa campagna. 
Donare è molto semplice:
basta cliccare sul riquadro "contribute now" a destra della pagina e seguire le indicazioni in tre passi.
Donando potrete anche, se lo desiderate, scegliere tra i premi che abbiamo messo a vostra dispozione (li trovate anche in questa pagina, nella colonna a destra).
Tutto viene fatto tramite PayPal, un metodo sicuro di pagamento online che ormai oggi tutti conoscono ed usano.

Ecco come potete fare:
  1. Cliccate sul riquadro rosa con scritto "Contribute Now"
  2. ora puoi scegliere il tuo premio (se lo desideri, altrimenti vai avanti cliccando su "continue")
  3. digita la somma che vuoi donare nel riquadro e clicca su "continue to payment" (sotto alla finestra con scritto l'importo, puoi anche scegliere se la tua donazione dovrà essere anonima)
  4. Controlla la finestra di riepilogo, a questo punto clicca su " Go to Paypal"

Perchè è così importante per noi?

Il nostro amico, Mihay, come tante altre persone, ha la distrofia.
Troppe volte ce ne stiamo con le mani in mano  quando per fare qualcosa basterebbe molto poco, ecco perchè siamo qui.
Non terremo un singolo centesimo di tutto quello che donerete ne di quelli che verranno dalle visualizzazioni su Youtube.

Poco è meglio di niente!

Nulla è troppo piccolo o insignificante se mettiamo le nostre forze insieme.

Anche una piccola donazione può cambiare tutto.

Pensate che se ognuna delle persone che visiterà questa pagina donasse anche solo un euro avremmo già raggiunto un traguardo al di là di ogni nostra aspettativa.


Non solo donazioni....

Se non potete contribuire ci sono molti altri modi in cui potete aiutare:
  • Iscrivetevi al nostro canale Youtube
  • Mettete "mi piace" alla nostra pagina Facebook
  • Guardate i video
  • Continuate a seguirci
  • Fateci sapere la vostra opinione e i vostri consigli
Perchè tutto questo?
Youtube da un certo ammontare per ogni visualizzazione, sulla base di specifici algoritmi, quindi guardare anche solo una volta uno dei nostri video significa che stai già contribuendo a combattere la Distrofia.
Ecco spiegato perchè abbiamo bisogno che ci aiutiate a diffondere il nostro progetto.


Per quelli che non lo sanno

La distrofia muscolare di Duchenne Colpisce quasi esclusivamente il sesso maschile durante i primi anni di vita, l'incidenza stimata è 1 su 3500 maschi.

La distrofia di Duchenne viene di solito riconosciuta al terzo anno di vita, ma almeno la metà dei pazienti presenta i segni della malattia prima che inizi la deambulazione.

Costituisce il 50% di tutte le forme distrofiche. Le femmine non sono colpite dalla malattia, ma ne sono portatrici, in quanto la malattia si eredita come carattere recessivo legato al cromosoma X. 

Il difetto è localizzato sul cromosoma X. Pertanto, solo i maschi (che hanno un solo cromosoma X) possono esserne colpiti da tali forme, mentre le femmine generalmente non hanno sintomi.

I primi segni che attirano l'attenzione sono l'incapacità di camminare o correre quando queste funzioni avrebbero già dovuto essere acquisite; oppure, una volta che queste attività vengano acquisite, i bambini appaiono meno attivi della norma e cadono facilmente.

Con il passare del tempo aumentano le difficoltà a camminare, correre, salire le scale. I primi muscoli ad essere colpiti sono il quadricipite, l' ileopsoas e i glutei. I muscoli del cingolo scapolare e degli arti superiori vengono colpiti successivamente.


Per maggiori informazioni vi invitiamo a visitare il sito web del Centro Dino Ferrari: http://www.centrodinoferrari.com/ 


Un Grazie enorme!!

Grazie a tutti i voi per il vostro supporto e la vostra gentilezza
Vi informeremo continuamente su come il nostro viaggio procederà, seguiteci e aiutateci a realizzare questo sogno!


English version


Three guys on the bummel

Hello everyone, 

We're Aldi, Matteo and Antonio, the RakiRush, three guys with a common passion: traveling. 

We recently had an idea, share with others our interest and use it to do something good, help scientific research into Duchenne Muscular, conducted by the "Centro Dino Ferrari", University of Milan.


So here is our plan: 

we will travel through the Balkans by car,  sleeping in a tent. Day by day we will film our adventure with a camera. 

Once back at home will post all the videos on our Youtube channel. 

The money we will gather from the displays will be entirely donated to the Dino Ferrari Center in Milan. 

The "Centro Dino Ferrari", University of Milan, Fondazione IRCCS Cà Granda, Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico of Milan, is responsible for clinical and scientific research in the field of muscolar and neurodegenrative diseases.


Our journey will begin Sunday, September 21, starting from our home in Rapolano Terme, in the province of Siena, Italy. We're going to cross Slovenia, Croatia, Bosnia, Montenegro, Kosovo to finally reach Albania. 

Among the fantastic places that we will have the opportunity to visit are:

  • the Postojna Caves (Slovenia) 
  • the Plitvice National Park (Croatia) 
  • Mostar (Bosnia and Herzegovina) 
  • the Durmitor National Park (Montenegro) 
  • Prizren (Kosovo) 
  • the Theth Park (Albania) 

and many more!


Here you can find our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/TheRakiRush


And here to twitter: https://twitter.com/therakirush


“Centro Dino Ferrari”: www.amicicentrodinoferrari.com


Your turn

Meanwhile we are making this trip we thought it might be useful to give to you the opportunity to contribute in order to raise as much  funds as possible. 

This is the reason why we created this campaign. 

Donating is very simple: 

just click the button "Contribute now" to the right of the page and follow the explenations in three steps.

By donating  you may, if you wish, choose among numerous perks (you can find them also on this page, on the right column). 

Everything is done through PayPal, a secure method of online payment that everyone knows and use.


Here's how you can do: 

  1. Click on the pink box which says "Contribute Now" 
  2. Now you can choose your perk (if you wish, otherwise go ahead by clicking on "continue")
  3. enter the amount you wish to donate in the box and click on "continue to payment" (written under the window with the amount, you can also choose whether your donation will be anonymous) 
  4. Check the summary window, at this point click on "Go to Paypal"


Why is it so important for us?

Our friend, Mihay, like so many other people in the world, has Duchenne. 

Too many times we dont'do anything to help others while it would be just enough to make it.

We won't keep a single penny of all that you will be giving to us as for those who will come from the displays on Youtube.

A bit's better than nothing!

Even a small donation can change everything. 

Nothing is too small or insignificant if we put our forces together. 

You should think that if each of the people who visits this page would donate just a euro we would have already reached a goal beyond our expectations.


Not only donations....

If you can not help there are many other ways you can help:

  • Subscribe to our YouTube channel 
  • Like our Facebook page
  • Watch the video and stay tuned
  • Let us know your opinion and your advice 

Why all this? 

Youtube gives a certain amount of money for each view , on the basis of specific algorithms, so even watching one of our video just one time means you're already helping to fight Duchenne. 

This explains why we need you to help us to spread our project.


For those who do not know

Duchenne muscular dystrophy affects almost exclusively males during the first years of life, the estimated incidence is 1 in 3500 males. 

Duchenne dystrophy is usually recognized in the third year of life, but at least half of the patients had signs of the disease before it starts walking. 

Constitutes 50% of all forms dystrophic. The females are not affected by the disease, but they are carriers, since the disease is inherited as a recessive X-linked character.

The defect is located on the chromosome X. Therefore, only the males (who have only one X chromosome) can be affected by these forms, while females generally have no symptoms.

The first signs that attract attention are the inability to walk or run when these functions should already have been acquired; or, once these assets are acquired, the children appear less active than the norm and they fall easily. 

With the passage of time increases the difficulty in walking, running, climbing stairs. The first muscles to be affected are the quadriceps, the iliopsoas and buttocks. The muscles of the shoulder girdle and upper limbs are affected later. 

For more information, please visit the Dino Ferrari Center's website: http://www.centrodinoferrari.com/


A huge Thanks!

Thanks to all of you for your support and your kindness 

You will be informed continuously about how  our journey is proceeding, help us make this dream come true!

Così ecco il nostro progetto:
viaggeremo attraverso i Balcani in macchina e dormiremo in tenda. Giorno per giorno riprenderemo la nostra avventura con una videocamera.

I soldi che riusciremo a raccogliere dalle visualizzazioni saranno interamente donati al Centro Dino Ferrari di Milano.

Il  “Centro Dino Ferrari”
dell’Università degli Studi di Milano, Fondazione IRCCS Cà Granda, Ospedale
Maggiore Policlinico di Milano,  si
occupa di ricerca clinica e scientifica nel
campo delle malattie muscolari e neurodegenerative.

Il nostro viaggio comincerà domenica 21 Settembre, partendo dalla nostra casa a Rapolano Terme, in provincia di Siena, attraverseremo Slovenia, Croazia, Bosnia, Montenegro, Kosovo per giungere infine l' Albania.

Tra i luoghi fantastici che avremo occasione di visitare ci sono:


le Grotte di Postumia (Slovenia)


il Parco nazionale dei laghi di Plitvice (Croazia)

Mostar (Bosnia ed Erzegovina)
il Durmitor National Parck (Montenegro)
Prizren (Kosovo)
il parco di Theth (Albania)

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheRakiRush

“Centro
Dino Ferrari”: www.amicicentrodinoferrari.com

Questo è il motivo per il quale abbiamo creato questa campagna. 
Donare è molto semplice:
basta cliccare sul riquadro "contribute now" a destra della pagina e seguire le indicazioni in tre passi.

Donando potrete anche, se lo desiderate, scegliere tra i premi che abbiamo messo a vostra dispozione (li trovate anche in questa pagina, nella colonna a destra).

Tutto viene fatto tramite PayPal, un metodo sicuro di pagamento online che ormai oggi tutti conoscono ed usano.

Ecco come potete fare:

Cliccate sul riquadro rosa con scritto "Contribute Now"
ora puoi scegliere il tuo premio (se lo desideri, altrimenti vai avanti cliccando su "continue")
digita la somma che vuoi donare nel riquadro e clicca su "continue to payment" (sotto alla finestra con scritto l'importo, puoi anche scegliere se la tua donazione dovrà essere anonima)
Controlla la finestra di riepilogo, a questo punto clicca su " Go to Paypal"




Perchè è così importante per noi?Il nostro amico, Mihay, come tante altre persone, ha la distrofia.
Troppe volte ce ne stiamo con le mani in mano  quando per fare qualcosa basterebbe molto poco, ecco perchè siamo qui.
Non terremo un singolo centesimo di tutto quello che donerete ne di quelli che verranno dalle visualizzazioni su Youtube.


Poco è meglio di niente!


Nulla è troppo piccolo o insignificante se mettiamo le nostre forze insieme.
Anche una piccola donazione può cambiare tutto.
Pensate che se ognuna delle persone che visiterà questa pagina donasse anche solo un euro avremmo già raggiunto un traguardo al di là di ogni nostra aspettativa.






Non solo donazioni....
Se non potete contribuire ci sono molti altri modi in cui potete aiutare:

Iscrivetevi al nostro canale Youtube

Mettete "mi piace" alla nostra pagina Facebook

Guardate i video
Continuate a seguirci
Fateci sapere la vostra opinione e i vostri consigli

Perchè tutto questo?
Youtube da un certo ammontare per ogni visualizzazione, sulla base di specifici algoritmi, quindi guardare anche solo una volta uno dei nostri video significa che stai già contribuendo a combattere la Distrofia.
Ecco spiegato perchè abbiamo bisogno che ci aiutiate a diffondere il nostro progetto.


Per quelli che non lo sanno

La distrofia muscolare di Duchenne Colpisce quasi esclusivamente il sesso maschile durante i primi anni di vita, l'incidenza stimata è 1 su 3500 maschi.
La distrofia di Duchenne viene di solito riconosciuta al terzo anno di vita, ma almeno la metà dei pazienti presenta i segni della malattia prima che inizi la deambulazione.
Costituisce il 50% di tutte le forme distrofiche. Le femmine non sono colpite dalla malattia, ma ne sono portatrici, in quanto la malattia si eredita come carattere recessivo legato al cromosoma X. 
Il difetto è localizzato sul cromosoma X. Pertanto, solo i maschi (che hanno un solo cromosoma X) possono esserne colpiti da tali forme, mentre le femmine generalmente non hanno sintomi.
I primi segni che attirano l'attenzione sono l'incapacità di camminare o correre quando queste funzioni avrebbero già dovuto essere acquisite; oppure, una volta che queste attività vengano acquisite, i bambini appaiono meno attivi della norma e cadono facilmente.
Con il passare del tempo aumentano le difficoltà a camminare, correre, salire le scale. I primi muscoli ad essere colpiti sono il quadricipite, l' ileopsoas e i glutei. I muscoli del cingolo scapolare e degli arti superiori vengono colpiti successivamente.

Per maggiori informazioni vi invitiamo a visitare il sito web del Centro Dino Ferrari: http://www.centrodinoferrari.com/ 



Un Grazie enorme!!


Grazie a tutti i voi per il vostro supporto e la vostra gentilezza
Vi informeremo continuamente su come il nostro viaggio procederà, seguiteci e aiutateci a realizzare questo sogno!

story:
The Journey

On December 8, a group of 10 young adults will travel from Des Moines, Iowa to Swaziland to join young adults from the Diocese of Swaziland and the Diocese of Brechin for a large gathering of young people in the church.

The Episcopal Diocese of Iowa has been in a companion relationship with the Diocese of Swaziland and the Diocese of Brechin in Scotland for nearly 25 years, resulting in shared ministries, close relationships, and a year round cycle of prayer for one another.

Together, in Swaziland, we will share our passions and faith, fostering new and continued relationships with our partners overseas, returning to Iowa equipped with a renewed commitment to shared ministry and mission with our global friends.

The journey to Swaziland will be funded by individual travelers, diocesan support, congregational support, and other donations

Logisitics

Here are the costs of our trip
  • Airfare: $1,600/person
  • Transportation in Swaziland: $500/person
  • Food & Lodging: $1,000/person

The Impact

The team that has been chosen to represent the Episcopal Diocese of Iowa is gifted with a variety of skills and passions. Those traveling have studied and expressed a desire to work toward relieving hunger, women's rights, education and care for vulnerable children, and HIV/AIDS. In meeting face-to-face with other young adults with similar passions and ministry, the young adults will form relationships that will continue beyond December and have an impact in the global mission of the Diocese of Iowa.

Ways You Can Help

Every little bit helps! Even $10 will help us make this trip happen. Please share this page with members of your congregation and others with a passion for global mission.

Support a New Option for Indie Authors – A Team Environment in which Authors are the Stars of the Show

Evolved Publishing has big plans for its growing team of indie authors, editors, artists, and translators – and of course, for its readers. We’re a low-cost provider (most of our eBooks are just $3.99, a few even less) of quality books across all channels, featuring some of the best indie authors out there, giving them an alternative to the difficult, lonely road of self-publishing, and one that treats them with the respect and control not found in traditional publishing. We also serve as gatekeepers for our readers, assuring the highest quality books – written well, edited well, and designed well – across all genres and styles. We hope your support will help us expand our reach and bring more great authors and books to you.

  • Readers get some of the best indie books available, at great low prices.
  • Authors get some of the highest royalty rates in the business.
  • Freelance editors, artists, and translators get new opportunities.
  • At EP, our guarantee is simple: Quality is Priority #1.

NOTE: For all eBook offerings below, you may receive your choice of one of the following file types: MOBI, EPUB, or PDF. ***Just be sure to USE YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS as the Address Line 1 for shipping.***

Gearing Up for New Opportunities

What are we trying to accomplish here?

  • We're hoping to generate $4,000-$10,000 to help lay the groundwork for a whole new round of marketing, new authors, new books, and overall growth to help our growing independent team.
  • As part of that, we're offering you some truly great values here!
  • Even if we fall short of our entire goal, every dollar raised means we can offer readers more great books, and offer our team members a great environment in which to pursue their artistic dreams.

Your Help Matters

Why do we need your help?

  • We seek to provide great books that combine a low cost with high value. EP offers a one-stop shop for readers of most genres, where they can trust in the quality of the books they purchase.
  • At the same time, we seek to compensate authors and their supporting team in a manner suitable to their talents and efforts - great royalty rates.
  • In a marketplace that is both crowded and a bit haphazard, and in an economy that has offered considerable challenges for many years, combining those two bullet points above is not always a simple matter.
  • We wish to keep our authors, and our whole team, moving forward even during these tough times, and your support will be a vital step in that process.

What's In It For You?

We understand that you may want to help us out because you're a fan of the arts, and because you love the idea of a place where the two critical sides of the equation come together:

  • Artists produce great work for your enjoyment because they can afford to keep doing so.
  • You enjoy great books now and well into the future, from a constant source of such works, in no small part due to your help.
However, we also want to make sure you get a real and immediate benefit in return for your help. Thus, each of the funding options provided, ranging from as little as $2 all the way up to $400, will give you a value that makes it an immediate benefit to you. Additionally, depending on the option you choose, you may receive public recognition for your support, or even a whole new platform for supporting the art of literature that you love so much (part of the "Forever Fan Club" funding option).

About our FOREVER FAN CLUB

We saved the best for last. As a “Forever Fan,” you will be eligible to receive all eBooks published by (and still under contract with) Evolved Publishing.  As of the date of this campaign, we have 70 active titles in English, with 15 more coming before the end of 2014. On tap for 2015 so far are 25-35 titles, and we expect to release 25-50 titles every year for the foreseeable future. You’ll be able to get all of our eBook releases, many of them weeks in advance of the actual release date, FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE! Wow. If you’re an avid reader who appreciates quality books, this is an amazing opportunity.

Given that our average eBook price is $3.99, you can see that it won’t be long before you’ll be ahead of the game, if you love reading as much as we love providing you great books.

Additionally, we will create a special page at the EP website to honor your support of EP. Though it won’t be active until this campaign is complete, it will appear at www.EvolvedPub.com/ForeverFans. We will, at the very least, list you by Name, City, State, and Country. Additionally, it will be your option to provide a full bio and headshot so that we can create a nice, full profile for you. Finally, as a Forever Fan, we will give you the opportunity to guest blog at our website about your favorite EP books, authors, team members, etc. You will, in essence, become a valued part of our team.

Please Spread the Word

Whether you can support us financially or just in spirit, we hope you will spread the word about this worthy effort. Come visit our website at www.EvolvedPub.com, subscribe to our newsletter and blog, stop by our Facebook page (EvolvedPublishing) and "Like" it, and share worthwhile posts there, and follow us on Twitter (EvolvedPub). We can always use your help.

  • Please share our Facebook posts, tweets, and blog post regarding this campaign.
  • It's simple if you use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much for your support. We do what we do out of pure love, and our greatest hope is that you will read our books, love them, and share that joy with your friends.

 Thank you so much for your support. We do what we do out of pure love, and our greatest hope is that you will read our books, love them, and share that joy with your friends.

story:
Short Summary

Let's not kid anybody. I'm inspired by the Potato Salad Dude over on Kickstarter. If he can do a Foodie Kickstarter for potato salad he's never made, I can do a Foodie Indiegogo for my world-famous fudge. People have been asking for a chance to get some for years, so here's a chance!

Honestly, there's also the fact that people have been telling me for years I could make a small holiday business out of selling my fudge. This is, as much as anything, seeing if that holds any prospect. I *love* doing it; the idea of making any money at it is rather splendid.

As for my elite fudge-making skills, well, the first time I made the Christmas fudge, at age 14, my mom tried a piece and said, "Well, I'll leave this to you from now on," and I've gotten better since. :)

Stretch Goals

$750: I will start by making basic chocolate/chocolate walnut fudge.
$1250: Peanut butter fudge joins the ranks.

$1500: Maple/maple-ginger fudge gets added to the haul.

$1750: DIABETIC FUDGE unlocked! I will experiment with diabetic chocolate fudge recipes & POSSIBLY EVEN see if one can be adjusted to different flavours!

$2250: VANILLA FUDGE unlocked! I have never made vanilla fudge. Indeed, until a couple days ago I had never even thought about vanilla fudge. Now I shall try to MAKE vanilla fudge! DUN DUN DAH DUN!

$3000: Mix & Match UNLOCKED! Backers will be able to select up to 3 types of fudge for their box. (Dairy-free & diabetic probably excluded; odds are I'll just be doing chocolate for those ones. ETA: Oh hey, someone asked if they can mix &  match if they feel personally safe in risking themselves for the other types. Sure, that's cool, it's on you for self-poisoning, then. :))

$3750: Sampler Box! Backers will be able to select up to one of each type of fudge + their preference to bring the box weight up to 450g/1lb. (Dairy-free & diabetic excluded, unless the caveat above is applied.)

$5000: involves Joanne! (If this level is unlocked, all backers, including $1 backers, will receive this perk.)

5000+: my hysterical laughter, + other good stuff o.o

Testimonials

Comic writer John Reppion: CE Murphy's fudge is fudging delicious. I have eaten it before and you need to taste it!

Fantasy novelist Beth Cato will totally vouch for the awesomeness of CE Murphy's fudge.

Fantasy novelist Steven Aryan: I have a massive sweet tooth. I'm a fudge connoisseur and snobby about it. CE Murphy makes the best I've ever tasted. Back her campaign.

Risks & Challenges

The worst risk here, honestly, is that I'm bad about getting things into the mail. OTOH, I do not want 20 pounds of fudge sitting around my house, so I'm pretty confident of getting it out the door to backers.

*Realistically* the smart time to send fudge is closer to the holidays than late summer, just because it's less likely to, you know, melt in the mail. Backers will be able to choose Hang The Risk, Send It Now, or Send It In October.

story:
Short Summary

Help us run this ad on sites NRA members visit.

The NRA makes it harder for members to quit its organization than for felons to buy weapons at gun shows. We’ve learned that NRA members who’ve tried to quit have been told their resignations would not be accepted because they didn’t resign through the NRA’s “official process.”

Meanwhile, the NRA fights to keep loopholes open that enable anyone – including dangerous felons – to walk into gun shows and buy weapons with no background checks whatsoever. The NRA fights for this over the objections of the majority of its members who SUPPORT universal background checks.

Not only does the NRA make it hard for people to quit, but it also keeps quiet about just how many members have tried to leave. While the NRA tries to keep resignations quiet, the media occasionally learns about high profile resignations, such as August Busch IV, heir to the Budweiser brewing fortune, who’s resignation letter told NRA leader Wayne LaPierre he “should be ashamed of himself and his organization” for opposing universal background checks and for representing the interests of gun manufacturers over its rank-and-file members.

We run Watchdog Causes, LLC, a cause-related communications company that specializes in online marketing and social media communications. We’ve been doing it for nearly 17 years, and our work reached over 40 million people for various causes in the last 18 months, alone.

We want to launch “How to Quit the NRA,” a campaign that will educate disaffected NRA members about how to quit, and also provide them with a place to make their actions and opinions known. We believe there are many rational, gun owning, 2nd Amendment-supporting NRA members, like August Busch, who have already quit, but not been recognized for it, or who WOULD quit, if only they knew how. We believe it’s important that such people have the opportunity to make their voices heard – and not be impeded and shrouded in secrecy by the NRA.

“How to Quit the NRA” will consist of the following elements:

  • A series of web ads, the first featuring August Busch IV, publicizing the brave actions of NRA members who’ve resigned in opposition to the organization’s shameful policies. Note: If enough money is raised, these web ads could become television ads in targeted markets.
  • The establishment of a blog and Facebook page for “How to Quit the NRA”
  • The creation of tools that aid disaffected NRA members in the resignation process
  • A public, online forum in which those who quit the NRA, who wish to be recognized for it, can be recognized
  • Paid online advertising, raised via this campaign, that will ensure the peoples’ voices are heard
  • A national press release, which will let the mainstream media know about this important grassroots effort

Because Watchdog Causes controls social media accounts that link to over 120,000 concerned activists, who are themselves connected to over 20 million friends, this campaign will reach at least 1.3 million people in just 3 days. Through viral sharing, millions more will be reached within a week.

This campaign will let the people be heard. It will send a message to the NRA that its members must be listened to. More importantly, it will send a message to our cowardly Congress that the NRA isn’t so frightening, anymore.

What We Need & What You Get

WHAT WE NEED

Because we are providing the creative and content development work on this campaign pro bono, your contributions that help us reach our $9,500 goal will have a tremendous impact. The vast majority of the funds raised will be spent on paid advertising and public relations activity that deliver the message directly to the right audiences. It WILL be seen, and it WILL be acted upon. Here is a breakdown of how the money raised will be spent:

  • Paid advertising 70%
  • Public relations/media relations: 10%
  • Development of tools to help disaffected NRA members quit: 10%
  • Programming & development: 10%

WHAT YOU GET

  • $1 – Access to a downloadable social media avatar letting your networks know you supported this cause.
  • $5 – Above, plus your name listed as “Generous Supporter” on the How to Quit the NRA blog.
  • $10 – Above, plus your name listed as a “Bronze Level” supporter on the How to Quit the NRA blog.
  • $15 – Above, plus a “It’s the Loopholes, Stupid” bumper sticker.
  • $25 – Your name listed as a “Silver Level” supporter on the How to Quit the NRA blog.
  • $30 – Above, plus a “Bad Guys Shouldn’t Get Guns – DUH!” bumper sticker.
  • $40 – Your name listed as a “Gold Level” supporter on the How to Quit the NRA blog, AND a “Bad Guys Shouldn’t Get Guns, DUH!” bumper sticker.
  • $50 – Your name listed as a “Platinum Level” supporter on the How to Quit the NRA blog, a “Protect Our Rights AND Our Children” bumper sticker.
  • $75 – Your name listed as a “Platinum Level” supporter on the How to Quit the NRA blog, plus each of the 3 bumper stickers listed above.
  • $100 – Your name listed as a “Platinum Level” supporter on the How to Quit the NRA blog, plus a campaign coffee cup.
  • $250 – Your name listed as a “True Patriot” level supporter on the How to Quit the NRA blog, plus each the 3 bumper stickers listed above, and a campaign coffee cup.
  • $2,000 or more – If you quit the NRA, you can be featured in your very own web ad, like August Busch IV (provided we reach our $9,500 goal), plus you will be listed as a “True Patriot” supporter on the How to Quit the NRA blog, and you will receive each of the 3 bumper stickers described above, and a campaign coffee cup.

If we do not reach our entire goal, 100% of the funds raised will still be spent to reach as many people as possible with this campaign, according to the formula described above.

Likewise, any funds raised beyond our goal will be spent to further expose this campaign to the public via online and mass media. The choice is yours. If the people wish, “How to Quit the NRA” can become a campaign aired on national television, in targeted markets, and on targeted shows watched by NRA members.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute at least $1 to this effort to support universal background checks, protect America’s innocent children, moms, and dads from gun violence, expose the NRA’s misguided policies, and encourage our cowardly Congress to do what’s right, you can still help us by:

  • Sharing this campaign and asking people to please support it, and share it themselves. The Indigogo website makes sharing easy!

Thank you!

Scott & Morgan

Watchdog Causes, LLC

story:
ACHIEVEMENT UNLOCKED: STRETCH GOALS

ALL STRETCH GOALS MET, thanks to you!

STRETCH GOAL 3: BOOK TOUR
For our final stretch goal, I'm targeting funds for a book tour after publication. Based on your requests, I'll travel to several communities for workshops/talks/booksignings in 2015. You can bring me to your city!

For this stretch goal we're aiming for $1,250 per location, to cover travel expenses and the cost of setting up a book event, plus a percentage for campaign costs and backer rewards. Here's what this would allow us to do. Locations and dates are still tentative!

$1250 (Campaign total $14,250)   DC/Baltimore - Sacred Space Conference/Between the Worlds (March 2015)
$2500 (Campaign total $15,500) Seattle + Vancouver BC - Gathering for Life (May 2015)
$3750 (Campaign total $16,750) New York - Polytheist Leadership Conference (June/July 2015)
$5000 (Campaign total $18,000) London/Glastonbury UK (September 2015 - aligning with Coru Priesthood Ireland tour)

We've surpassed the last stretch goal at $18,000! Your additional contributions in the last 32 hours of the campaign will to toward adding additional book tour locations.

$6250 (Campaign total $19,250) Location TBD
$7,500 (Campaign total $20,500) Location TBD

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Book of the Great Queen: you've asked for it, and it's almost here! After years of research and requests from you, I'm ready to bring this long-awaited book to life. Together, we'll explore the mysteries of the Morrigan, the ancient Celtic Goddess of battle, sovereignty, prophecy, and Otherworld power. Your backing is all I need to bring this comprehensive and powerful book to publication!


Bringing the Great Queen to You

My name is Morpheus Ravenna. I write the Shieldmaiden Blog and I'm known in my community for my service as a priest of the Morrigan, the Celtic Goddess of battle, prophecy, and Otherworld power. I've been studying these traditions for almost 20 years – my entire adult life. I've combed the volumes of Irish lore, ancient history and archaeology, and modern scholarly study for insights to help modern practitioners understand and connect with the Great Queen. My research notes encompass hundreds of pages of material, some of it never presented outside academic publications. And now I'm ready to share my years of study with you.


The book I'm writing combines the depth of historical perspective with the insights of a modern practicing devotional polytheist. It's a book unlike anything else that has been published to date, and I'm thrilled to be collaborating with Concrescent Press as my publisher to bring this book to you.

Just like any big project, there are costs to getting it done, including publishing costs as well as the time I need to devote to writing the book. So I need you to be part of bringing The Book of the Great Queen to life. You can make this possible by backing me!



What I Offer You

The heart of every alliance is reciprocity, isn't it? So here's what I have to offer you. We've created a spectacular array of rewards for our backers, including:

  • Autographed copies of the book, sent to you before release to members of the public
  • Electronic editions of the book
  • Exclusive, limited edition signed and numbered art prints from original devotional art ONLY for backers of this campaign
  • Exclusive, limited edition “SOVEREIGN” T-shirts with the Great Queen art design, ONLY for backers of this campaign
  • Ultra-rare hand-bound artistic editions of the book, created by fellow priest of the Morrigan and professional book artist Amelia Hogan
  • Inner-circle participation for my backer community including private behind-the-scenes Q&A sessions and vblog updates, early release draft material, and more. Come along with me as I pen the project of a lifetime!
  • Personal gratitude - your name in the book as my patron, personal thank-you letters, and hand-scripted prayers
  • Original, one of a kind devotional artwork available to one elite backer
  • and much more!

Newest Perk: Limited Edition RAVEN MEDALLIONS

Many of you have asked me if I'll be offering any of my etched copper medallions as backer rewards - and so I've decided to go ahead and create a limited run of special medallions for the campaign.

Here's an image of the new, limited edition RAVEN medallions! These will ONLY be offered through this campaign.

Hand-etched and finished in 18 gauge copper, hung on a woven-knotwork leather cord, and blessed on my altar.

The "PEACE TO THE SKY" Prophecy Art

I’m creating this new devotional artwork just for The Book of the Great Queen: an ornately detailed depiction of the Morrigan and Her “Peace to the sky” poem, hand-painted in "Book of Kells" illuminated manuscript style on real calfskin vellum. A limited number of high-quality signed and numbered art prints from this piece will be made, exclusively for backers of this campaign. These prints will ONLY be available through this campaign! And one elite backer has the opportunity to claim the one-of-a-kind original artwork, signed and framed for display.


Current stage of the Morrigan's "PEACE TO THE SKY" Prophecy art. We'll continue to post updates as the work is completed!


The HAND-BOUND EDITIONS:

Hand-crafted by book artist Amelia Hogan, these very limited exquisite hand-bound artistic editions will be made individually, using fine printmaking paper in signatures, hand case-bound using waxed Irish linen thread, PvA adhesive and small dye-lot endpapers; hand-scraped leather spine covering 1/8" Davey book-board; title and spine lettering pressed in gold.

Here's a preview of Amelia's exquisite craftsmanship: please note that the decorative papers and textures used in our editions may vary from this prototype.

    


The T-SHIRTS:

Here's our original design for the "SOVEREIGN" t-shirts, which will be exclusively printed for this campaign:


Here's a mockup showing the look of the t-shirts once they're printed:

These t-shirts will be printed from a sweatshop-free screenprinter, and will be available in unisex/men's and girly-fit/women's, sizes up to 6X.

The Team

As I’ve said above, I’ve spent nearly 20 years - my entire adult life - immersing myself in the study of Celtic spiritual traditions and the Morrigan. As both scholar and priest, I bring a unique perspective to the study of Her lore, incorporating both scholarship and ritual insight. My writings on the Morrigan, spiritual practice, and other topics have been widely read in my blog, the Shieldmaiden Blog. I bring years of experience serving the community through building organizations and developing traditions, such as my work in the founding of the Coru Cathubodua Priesthood, and the Stone City Pagan Sanctuary. I have the knowledge, the skill, and the dedication to see the project through, and to be financially and ethically accountable to my community of backers.

    

I’m honored to be working with a kickass team on this project: The book will be published by Concrescent Press, an independent esoteric publishing house headed by Sam Webster, M.Div., a priest and brilliant scholar of Pagan studies and the magical arts. Other team members include book artist Amelia Hogan, who will be creating the hand-bound artistic editions of the book; as well as Wild Hunt writer Rynn Fox, who is assisting with video and marketing for this campaign, as well as manuscript review. I’ll also be working with a small handful of respected Celtic scholars to review a draft of my work before publication.

The Details

Here's what I'll be using your contributions for:

Primary fundraising goal:  $7,500.00


STRETCH GOAL #1: EXCEEDED!

ORIGINAL ILLUSTRATION ARTWORK: $2000 (Campaign total $9,500.00)

We'll be able to commission original artwork to illustrate the book, making it an even more beautiful work of art! We're working with accomplished esoteric artist Valerie Herron, whose work has been featured on the Wild Hunt and Coru Priesthood home pages. Here's a sample of her exquisite work:


STRETCH GOAL #2: EXCEEDED!

POETRY & SONGS OF THE MORRIGAN: $3500 (Campaign total: $13,000)

Perhaps you've read the powerful, enchanting poems of the Morrigan, translated into English. Perhaps you've seen the original Old Irish text. But few people living have had the opportunity to hear the poems spoken aloud as vocal ritual incantations - the native form for which they were composed in ancient times. NOW YOU WILL.

Now that we've met this goal, we'll be able to create a gorgeous, professional studio recording of the poems of the Morrigan, spoken aloud as an enchanting vocal incantation, in both the original Old Irish, as well as the English translations. We'll also include a couple of beautiful devotional chants and songs in Irish and Gaulish, never before recorded!

These unique and unprecedented recordings will be made available as a digital download to ALL PROJECT BACKERS at the $20 level and above.

The Impact

The Book of the Great Queen is the work of a lifetime for me, and I feel passionate about bringing it to fruition. The Morrigan's call to sovereignty in action speaks especially to the needs of our time. We need heroes, and more than that, we need to find the hero within ourselves to meet the challenges and the struggles that we face. In this book, I reach deep into the roots of Celtic tradition to bring forward accessible and powerful practices for engaging with the Morrigan in your own path. You can be part of making this work available for everyone.

So I invite you to join me: Be part of this exciting and powerful work of bringing The Book of the Great Queen to life. Join me by backing this campaign, and please share this page with your friends!


Questions? Campaign feedback? Want to suggest a new perk or idea for this campaign? Contact me at morpheus@bansheearts.com. I'd love to hear from  you!
